default: (a)一件{@item 鱗甲|phb} 或 (b)一件{@item 皮甲|phb}
(a)二把{@item 短劍|phb} 或 (b)二把{@filter 簡易近戰武器|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon;melee weapon}
(a)一套{@item 地城探險家套裝|phb} 或 (b)一套{@item 探索者套裝|phb}
一把{@item 長弓|phb}和一個裝有{@item 箭(20)|phb|20支箭}的{@item 箭袋|phb}

classFeatures.name: 宿敵
entries: 從1級開始，你在對一個特定類型的敵人的研究、追跡、狩獵、和甚至交談上已相當具備充足的經驗。

選擇一個宿敵類型：{@filter 異怪|bestiary|type=aberration}、{@filter 野獸|bestiary|type=beast}、{@filter 天界生物|bestiary|type=celestial}、{@filter 構裝體|bestiary|type=construct}、{@filter 龍|bestiary|type=dragon}、{@filter 元素|bestiary|type=elemental}、{@filter 精類|bestiary|type=fey}、{@filter 邪魔|bestiary|type=fiend}、{@filter 巨人|bestiary|type=giant}、{@filter 怪獸|bestiary|type=monstrosity}、{@filter 泥怪|bestiary|type=ooze}、{@filter 植物|bestiary|type=plant}、或{@filter 不死生物|bestiary|type=undead}。或者，你可以選擇二個{@filter 類人生物|bestiary|type=humanoid}種族（像是{@creature 豺狼人|mm}和{@creature 獸人|mm}）做為宿敵。
你在用於追蹤你宿敵的睿知（{@skill 求生}）檢定、以及用以回憶關於它們情報的智力檢定中具有優勢。
當你獲得此能力時，若你的宿敵擁有至少一種語言，你也選擇學會一種被它們所使用的語言。
你在6級和14級時選擇一種額外的宿敵以及一種關聯語言。隨著你提升等級，你的選擇必須反映你在你冒險中所遭遇過的怪物類型。

classFeatures.name: 自然探索者
entries: 你特別熟悉於一種自然環境，且熟稔在這類區域中旅行和生存的方式。選擇一種偏好環境：極地、海岸、沙漠、森林、草地、高山、沼澤、或幽暗地域。當你進行一次關聯於你偏好環境的智力或睿知檢定時，若你使用一個你所熟練的技能，則你的熟練加值變為二倍。
當在你的偏好環境中旅行長達1個小時或更久，你將獲得下列好處：

items: 困難地形不會減慢你們團隊的旅行速度。
除非是因為魔法的緣故，否則你們團隊不會迷路。
即使你在旅行途中正從事於其他行動（像是覓食、導航、或追跡），你仍保持對危險的警戒。
若你正獨自旅行，你能夠以正常步調隱匿移動。
當你覓食時，你能找到二倍你原本所能找到的食物。
當你追跡其他生物時，你也能得知它們確切的數量、它們的體型、以及它們在多久之前經過這片區域。

entries: 你在6級和10級時選擇一種額外的偏好環境。

classFeatures.name: 戰鬥風格
entries: 在2級時，你採用一種特殊的戰鬥風格以做為你的專業。從下列選項中選擇一種。你不能獲得相同的戰鬥風格選項超過一次，即使你有機會再選擇它也一樣。

entries.name: 弓道
entries: 你在使用遠程武器進行的攻擊檢定中獲得+2加值。

entries.name: 近身射手
entries: 當你在距離一個敵意生物5呎以內時進行一次遠程攻擊，你在該攻擊檢定中並不會具有劣勢。你的遠程攻擊忽略距離你30呎內目標的半掩護和四分之三掩護。你在遠程攻擊的攻擊檢定中獲得+1加值。

entries.name: 防禦
entries: 當你穿戴護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值。

entries.name: 決鬥
entries: 當你單手持用一把近戰武器，且沒有持用其他武器時，你在使用該武器所進行的傷害骰中獲得+2加值。

entries.name: 水手
entries: 只要你未穿戴重甲或使用盾牌，你就擁有等同於你正常移動速度的游泳速度和攀爬速度，且你的AC獲得+1加值。

entries.name: 坑道鬥士
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你可以進入防禦架式並持續直到你的下個回合開始。當你處於防禦架式時，你可以進行藉機攻擊而無需使用你的反應，且你可以處於你觸及範圍內的生物移動超過5呎時使用你的反應對它進行一次近戰攻擊。

entries.name: 雙武器戰鬥
entries: 當你進行雙武器戰鬥時，你可以將你的屬性調整值加入第二次攻擊的傷害中。

classFeatures.name: 施法
entries: 在你升至2級時，你學會如同德魯伊的方式使用大自然的精粹以施放法術。請參閱{@book 第十章|PHB|10}以了解關於施法的規則，以及第十一章以查閱{@filter 遊俠法術列表|spells|class=ranger}。

entries.name: 法術位
entries: 遊俠表中顯示了你有多少個法術位可以用來施放你一環或更高環的{@filter 遊俠法術|spells|class=ranger}。要施放其中一個法術，你必須消耗一個與該法術環階相同或更高的法術位。你在完成一次長休後恢復所有你花費掉的法術位。
舉例來說，如果你知曉一個1環的{@spell 化獸為友}法術，且你擁有一個1環和一個2環的法術位，則你可以使用其中任意一個法術位來施放{@spell 化獸為友}。

entries.name: 一環或更高環的已知法術
entries: 你知曉二個從遊俠法術列表中自選的1環法術。
遊俠表中的已知法術欄位顯示你將在何時學習到更多自選的遊俠法術。每個這些法術的環階都必須符合你所擁有法術位的環階。舉例來說，當你在此職業升至5級時，你可以學習一個新的1環或2環法術。
此外，當你提升這個職業的等級時，你可以從遊俠的法術列表中挑選一個法術來取代一個你目前已知的法術，而它的環階也必須符合你所擁有法術位的環階。

entries.name: 施法屬性
entries: 由於你的魔法是源自你與大自然的協調，睿知是你施展遊俠法術的施法屬性。每當法術提及你的施法屬性時，你將使用你的睿知。此外，當決定你遊俠法術的豁免DC、以及使用遊俠法術進行攻擊檢定時，你使用你的睿知調整值。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠範型
entries: 在3級時，你從可選範型列表中選擇一種你致力於達成的範型。你的選擇將在3級、7級、11級、和15級時賦予你新的能力。

classFeatures.name: 原初意識
entries: 從3級開始，你可以使用你的動作並消耗一個遊俠法術位以集中你的意識於你周遭的區域。在為你所消耗法術位的每環階1分鐘內，你可以感知下列類型的生物是否存在於距離你1哩內的區域：異怪、天界生物、龍、元素、精類、邪魔、和不死生物。此能力無法揭露出該生物的位置和數量。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至4級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 額外攻擊
entries: 從5級開始，每當你在你的回合採取{@action 攻擊}動作，你可以攻擊二次，而非一次。

classFeatures.name: 宿敵和自然探索者強化
classFeatures.ENG_name: Favored Enemy and Natural Explorer improvements
entries: 在6級時，你獲得一種額外的偏好環境。
在6級時，你選擇一種額外的宿敵以及一種關聯語言。你的選擇必須反映你在你冒險中所遭遇過的怪物類型。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠範型能力
entries: 在7級時，你獲得一個由你遊俠範型所賦予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至8級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 大地行者
entries: 從8級開始，移動穿過非魔法的困難地形並不會花費你額外的移動速度。你也可以穿越非魔法植物而不會被它們減緩速度，若它們是荊棘、棘刺、或其他類似危險，你也不會被它們的傷害。
此外，在對抗由魔法創造或控制的植物所造成的阻礙移動效果時（像是{@spell 糾纏術}法術創造出的植物），你所進行的豁免檢定具有優勢。

classFeatures.name: 避人耳目
entries: 從10級開始，你可以花費1分鐘的時間為自己創造一個偽裝。你必須要能取用新鮮的泥巴、土壤、植物、煙灰、和其他自然產出的材料以創造你的偽裝。
一旦你透過這個方式偽裝，你可以透過將自己貼合於一個高度和寬度至少與你一樣大的固體表面上，例如樹木或牆壁，以嘗試進行躲藏。只要你待於該處且不移動或採取動作，你就在敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中獲得+10的加值。一旦你移動或採取動作或反應，你就必須再次偽裝自己以獲得這個好處。

classFeatures.name: 自然探索者強化
entries: 在10級時，你獲得一種額外的偏好環境。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠範型能力
entries: 在11級時，你獲得一個由你遊俠範型所賦予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至12級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 無蹤步
entries: 從14級開始，你可以在你的回合以一個附贈動作採取{@action 躲藏}動作。同時，你不會被非魔法的手段追蹤，除非你選擇留下蹤跡。

classFeatures.name: 宿敵強化
entries: 在14級時，你選擇一種額外的宿敵以及一種關聯語言。你的選擇必須反映你在你冒險中所遭遇過的怪物類型。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠範型能力
entries: 在15級時，你獲得一個由你遊俠範型所賦予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至16級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 野性感官
entries: 在18級時，你獲得超自然的感官以幫助你對抗看不見的生物。當你攻擊一個你看不見的生物時，你並不會因為無法看見它而在你對它進行的攻擊檢定中承受劣勢。同時，只要該生物沒有躲藏於你，且你不處於{@condition 目盲}或{@condition 耳聾}狀態，則你也能察覺到任何距離你30呎內{@condition 隱形}生物的位置。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至19級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 眾敵屠戮
entries: 在20級時，你成為了一名針對你敵人的無雙獵手。在你的每個回合一次，你可以將你的睿知調整值加到你對你其中一個宿敵所進行的攻擊檢定或傷害骰中。你可以選擇在擲骰之前或之後使用此能力，但是必須在任何擲骰效果適用之前使用。

subclassFeatures.name: 獵人
entries: 仿效獵人範型意味著接受你做為文明和荒野恐懼間壁壘的身分。隨著你行走在獵人的道途上，你學會對抗迎面而來威脅的專業技巧，從狂暴的食人魔、成群的獸人、到巨人和恐怖的龍族們。

entries.name: 狩者獵物
entries: 在3級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：巨怪獵者、巨人殺手、或滅族者。

entries.name: 巨怪獵者
entries: 你的執著可以毀滅最強大的敵人。當你以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物，若它的生命值低於最大值，則該生物將受到額外的{@dice 1d8}傷害。你每回合只能造成一次這個額外傷害。

entries.name: 巨人殺手
entries: 當一個距離你5呎內，體型為大型或更大的生物對你進行的一次攻擊命中或失手時，只要你可以看見該生物，你就可以使用你的反應以立刻在它的攻擊之後對它進行攻擊。

entries.name: 滅族者
entries: 在你的每個回合一次，當你進行一次武器攻擊時，你可以使用相同的武器對一個距離原本目標5呎內，且處於你武器射程內的另一個生物進行另一次攻擊。

entries.name: 防禦性戰術
entries: 在7級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：逃離眾敵、防禦多重攻擊、或鋼鐵意志。

entries.name: 逃離眾敵
entries: 所有對你進行的藉機攻擊將具有劣勢。

entries.name: 防禦多重攻擊
entries: 當一個生物以一次攻擊命中你時，你的AC將對該生物在該回合中所進行的所有後續攻擊獲得+4的加值。

entries.name: 鋼鐵意志
entries: 你在對抗{@condition 恐懼}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

entries.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 在11級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：箭雨、或劍刃風暴。

entries.name: 箭雨
entries: 你可以使用你的動作以進行一次遠程攻擊，並以處於你武器射程內你所能看見一點的周圍10呎範圍內的任意數量個生物做為目標。你必須有足夠的彈藥以攻擊每個目標，且你為每個目標進行各自的攻擊檢定。

entries.name: 劍刃風暴
entries: 你可以使用你的動作以進行一次近戰攻擊，並以距離你5呎內的任意數量個生物做為目標，為每個目標進行各自的攻擊檢定。

entries.name: 卓越獵人防禦
entries: 在15級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：反射閃避、逆潮而立、或直覺閃避。

entries.name: 反射閃避
entries: 你可以靈活地躲開某些範圍效果，像是紅龍的火焰吐息、或{@spell 閃電束}法術。當你成為一個允許你進行敏捷豁免以僅承受一半傷害的效果的目標時，你改為在豁免成功時不受任何傷害，且在豁免失敗時僅承受一半傷害。

entries.name: 逆潮而立
entries: 當一個敵對生物對你進行的一次近戰攻擊失手，你可以使用你的反應以強迫該生物對你所選擇的另一個生物（除了它自己以外）重複進行一次該攻擊。

entries.name: 直覺閃避
entries: 當一個你所能看見的攻擊者使用一次攻擊命中你，你可以使用你的反應以減半該次攻擊對你的傷害。

subclassFeatures.name: 獸王
entries: 獸王範型體現了文明種族和自然野獸之間的情誼。團結一致，野獸和游俠將共同對抗威脅著文明和自然世界的可怕敵人。仿效獸王範型意味著將自己奉獻給這個理念，與動物做為同伴和朋友一同奮鬥。

entries.name: 遊俠動物夥伴
entries: 在3級時，你獲得一個動物夥伴，牠將陪伴你一起冒險，並受過訓練以與你一起戰鬥。選擇一個{@filter 體型不超過中型，且挑戰等級為1/4或更低的野獸|bestiary|challenge rating=0;1/8;1/4|type=beast|size=f;d;t;s;m|miscellaneous=!swarm}。將你的熟練加值加入該野獸的AC、攻擊檢定、傷害骰，以及任何牠所熟練的豁免檢定和技能中。牠的生命值最大值等同於牠正常的生命值最大值或你遊俠等級的四倍，兩者取高。

該野獸將盡其所能的服從你的命令。牠會在你的先攻順序採取牠的行動。在你的回合，你可以口頭命令該野獸移動到某處（你不需要花費動作）。你也可以使用你的動作以口頭命令牠採取{@action 攻擊}、{@action 疾走}、{@action 撤離}、{@action 閃避}、或{@action 協助}動作。一旦你獲得額外攻擊能力，則當你命令該野獸採取{@action 攻擊}動作時，你可以自己進行一次武器攻擊。
若你處於{@condition 無力}狀態或不在現場，你的動物夥伴將會自主行動，專注於保護你或牠自己。牠使用牠的反應時不需要你的命令，例如進行一次藉機攻擊。
跟其他生物一樣，野獸可以在短休期間消耗生命骰。
當你只和該野獸一起在你的偏好環境中旅行時，你們能夠以正常步調隱匿移動。
若該野獸死亡，你可以藉由花費8小時的時間以用魔法與另一個對你不具有敵意的野獸建立連結以再次獲得動物夥伴。該野獸可以是與之前那隻相同或不同類型的野獸。

entries.name: 超絕訓練
entries: 從7級開始，在你的任何回合，只要你的動物夥伴沒有攻擊，你就可以使用一個附贈動作以命令該野獸在它的回合採取{@action 疾走}、{@action 撤離}、或{@action 協助}動作。此外，該野獸的攻擊現在起將在克服對非魔法攻擊和傷害的抗性和免疫能力時被視作魔法攻擊。

entries.name: 野性狂怒
entries: 從11級開始，當你命令你的動物夥伴採取{@action 攻擊}動作時，該野獸可以進行二次攻擊，或採取牠擁有的多重攻擊動作。

entries.name: 法術共享
entries: 從15級開始，當你施放以你自己為目標的法術時，若你的動物夥伴距離你30呎內，你也可以讓它受到該法術的影響。

subclassFeatures.name: Deep Stalker
entries: Many Deep Stalkers are elves, as those folk know all too well the threat posed by the drow. Deep Stalkers scout for new passages into the Underdark, carefully mapping them and working to ensure they remain watched at all times. They venture into the depths on long, dangerous patrols, disappearing for months at a time. Many of them never return. Deep Stalkers master spells useful in navigating the Underdark, and their combat tactics focus on ambush, surprise, and stealth. They fight alone or in small groups in hostile territory, relying on clever tactics to carry the day.

entries.name: Deep Stalker Magic
entries: From 3rd level, you have darkvision with a range of 90 feet. You also gain access to additional spells at 3rd, 5th, 9th, 13th, and 15th level. You are always able to cast these spells, and they do not count against your number of ranger spells known.

entries.name: Underdark Scout
entries: At 3rd level, you master the art of the ambush. On your first turn during combat, you gain a +10 bonus to your speed. If you use the attack action on that turn, you can make one additional attack. You gain an additional benefit on all turns after your first turn. At the end of each such turn, you can attempt to hide as a bonus action if you meet the normal requirements for hiding.

entries.name: Iron Mind
entries: At 7th level, you gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws.

entries.name: Stalker's Flurry
entries: Starting at 11th level, you have the ability to ensure that your attacks count. If you miss with an attack during your turn, you can immediately make an additional attack. You can gain one additional attack during your turn with this ability.

entries.name: Stalker's Dodge
entries: At 15th level, you master the ability to disrupt an opponent's attacks. If a creature attacks you and does not have advantage on the attack roll, you can use your reaction to grant it disadvantage on the attack roll. You must use this ability before you know the result of the attack.

subclassFeatures.name: Horizon Walker
entries: Rangers of the Horizon Conclave guard the world against threats that originate from other planes. They seek out planar portals and keep watch over them, venturing to the outer and inner planes as needed to defeat threats.

entries.name: Planar Magic
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Horizon Walker Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, and it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.name: Planar Warrior
entries: At 3rd level, you learn to draw on the energy of the planes to augment your attacks.

As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. Until the end of this turn, your attacks against that creature ignore its damage resistances, and the next time you hit it on this turn, it takes an additional {@dice 1d6} force damage.

entries.name: Portal Lore
entries: At 3rd level, you gain the ability to detect the presence of planar portals. As an action, you detect the distance and direction to any planar portals within 1,000 feet of you. You also sense which plane of existence each portal leads to. However, if magic obscures any details of a portal, this feature doesn't reveal them.
Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest. Alternatively, you can use the feature again if you expend a spell slot of 2nd level or higher.
See the "Planar Travel" section in chapter 2 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for examples of planar portals.

entries.name: Ethereal Step
entries: At 7th level, you learn to step through the Ethereal Plane. As a bonus action on your turn, you can cast the {@spell etherealness} spell with this feature, but the spell ends at the end of the current turn. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Distant Strike
entries: At 11th level, you gain the ability to step between the planes in a blink of an eye. When you use the {@action Attack} action, you can teleport up to 10 feet before each attack. You must be able to see the destination of the teleportation.
If you attack at least two different creatures with the action, you can make one additional attack with it against a third creature.

entries.name: Spectral Defense
entries: At 15th level, your ability to move between planes becomes even more finely tuned. As a reaction when you take damage, you can halve that damage against you. For a moment, you slip into the planar boundary to lessen the harm.

subclassFeatures.name: Primeval Guardian
entries: Rangers of the Primeval Guardian Conclave follow an ancient tradition rooted in powerful druidic magic. These rangers learn to become one with nature, allowing them to channel the aspects of various beasts and plants in order to overcome their foes.

These rangers dwell in the elder forests of the world. They venture out only rarely, as they consider it their sacred duty to protect the druidic groves and ancient trees that saw the earliest days of the world.

entries.name: Guardian Magic
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Primeval Guardian Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, and it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.name: Guardian Soul
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you gain the ability to temporarily grow and take on the appearance of a treelike person, covered with leaves and bark. As a bonus action, you assume this guardian form, which lasts until you end it as a bonus action or until you are {@condition incapacitated}.
You undergo the following changes while in your guardian form:

items: Your size becomes Large, unless you were larger.
Any speed you have becomes 5 feet, unless the speed was lower.
Your reach increases by 5 feet.
You gain a number of temporary hit points at the start of each of your turns. The number equals half your ranger level. When the form ends, you lose any temporary hit points you have from it.

entries.name: Piercing Thorns
entries: At 3rd level, your command of primal magic allows you to enhance your attacks with thorns. Once during each of your turns, you can deal an additional {@dice 1d6} piercing damage to one creature you hit with a weapon attack.

entries.name: Ancient Fortitude
entries: At 7th level, you gain the endurance of the ancient forests. Your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 2 per ranger level when you assume your guardian form. This increase lasts until you leave the form; your hit point maximum then returns to normal, but your current hit points remain the same, unless they must decrease to abide by your hit point maximum.
Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Rooted Defense
entries: At 11th level, you gain the ability to twist and turn the ground beneath you. While you are in your guardian form, the ground within 30 feet of you is difficult terrain for your enemies.

entries.name: Guardian Aura
entries: Starting at 15th level, your guardian form emanates a magical aura that fortifies your injured allies. When any ally starts their turn within 30 feet of your guardian form, that ally regains a number of hit points equal to half your ranger level. This aura has no effect on a creature that has half or more of its hit points, and it has no effect on undead and constructs.

subclassFeatures.name: Monster Slayer
entries: Rangers of the Slayer Conclave seek out vampires, dragons, evil fey, fiends, and other powerful magical threats. Trained in a variety of arcane and divine techniques to overcome such monsters, slayers are experts at unearthing and defeating mighty foes.

entries.name: Slayer's Mysticism
entries: You learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Slayer Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you but doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.name: Slayer's Eye
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you gain the ability to study and unravel a creature's defenses. As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 120 feet of you. You immediately learn the target's vulnerabilities, immunities, and resistances. You also learn any special effects triggered when the target takes damage, such as fire damage halting its regeneration.
In addition, the first time each turn you hit the target with a weapon attack, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} damage from the weapon.
This benefit lasts until you target a different creature with this feature or until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Supernatural Defense
entries: At 7th level, you gain extra resilience against your prey's assaults on your mind and body. Whenever the target of your Slayer's Eye forces you to make a saving throw, add {@dice 1d6} to your roll.

entries.name: Relentless Slayer
entries: At 11th level, you gain the ability to foil your foe's ability to escape. Your study of folklore and arcane knowledge gives you a key insight to keep your prey cornered. If the target of your Slayer's Eye attempts to teleport, change its shape, travel to another plane of existence, or turn gaseous, you can use your reaction to make a Wisdom check contested by a Wisdom check made by the target. To use this ability, you must be able to see the target and need to be within 30 feet of it. If you succeed, you foil its attempt, causing it to waste the action, bonus action, or reaction it used.

entries.name: Slayer's Counter
entries: At 15th level, you gain the ability to counterattack when your prey tries to sabotage you. If the target of your Slayer's Eye forces you to make a saving throw, you can use your reaction to make one weapon attack against it. You make this attack immediately before making the saving throw. If the attack hits, your save automatically succeeds, in addition to the attack's normal effects.

subclassFeatures.name: 幽域追蹤者
entries: 幽域追蹤者居身於那些最黑暗的場所：地表深處、暗巷之間、太古叢林、和其他任何籠罩在昏暗微光的地方。大部分人們在進入這種場所時都會驚恐不安，但幽域追蹤者們卻能大膽於黑暗中冒險，試圖在威脅來到廣闊世界之前伏擊它們。這類遊俠經常出沒於幽暗地域，但是他們也會前往任何邪惡勢力蟄伏的所在。

entries.name: 幽域追蹤者魔法
entries: 從3級開始，當你在本職業升至特定等級，你將學會額外的法術，如幽域追蹤者法術表所示。這些法術對你而言視作遊俠法術，但並不會計入你已知遊俠法術的數量中。

entries.name: 懼怖伏兵
entries: 在3級時，你精通於伏擊的藝術。你可以讓你先攻檢定獲得等同於你睿知調整值的加值。
在每個戰鬥的你的第一個回合開始時，你的步行速度增加10呎，持續直到該回合結束。若你在該回合採取{@action 攻擊}動作，做為該動作的一部份，你可以進行一次額外的武器攻擊。若該攻擊命中，則目標將受到額外{@dice 1d8}該武器傷害類型的傷害。

entries.name: 幽影視覺
entries: 在3級時，你獲得60呎範圍的黑暗視覺。若你已經擁有來自你種族的黑暗視覺，則它的範圍將增加30呎。
你也擅長於避開依賴於黑暗視覺的生物。當處於黑暗環境時，你對任何嘗試依靠黑暗視覺以看見黑暗中的你的生物而言處於{@condition 隱形}狀態。

entries.name: 鋼鐵心智
entries: 從7級起，你已磨練出用於抵抗來自於你獵物的精神影響力量的能力。你獲得睿知豁免的熟練。若你已經擁有此熟練，則你可以改為獲得智力豁免或魅力豁免的熟練（由你選擇）。

entries.name: 追獵如風
entries: 在11級時，你學會以出人意料的高速進行攻擊，以讓你將一次失手轉變成另一次打擊。在你的每個回合一次，當你的一次武器攻擊失手時，你可以進行另一次武器攻擊以做為同個動作的一部份。

entries.name: 暗影閃避
entries: 從15級開始，隨著一縷環繞在你身邊的超自然陰影，你能夠以令人無法預料的方式閃躲。當一個生物對你進行一次攻擊檢定且該檢定不具有優勢，你可以使用你的反應以讓它承受劣勢。你必須在你知道該攻擊檢定的結果之前決定是否使用此能力。

subclassFeatures.name: 境界行者
entries: 境界行者守護著世界不受來自其他位面、或試圖以異界魔法摧毀凡界的威脅所侵害。他們尋找並看守著位面傳送門，為了追捕他們的敵人而冒險穿梭於內層位面和外層位面。這些遊俠也是多元宇宙中任何致力於守護位面中生靈和秩序的勢力的盟友—尤其是那些善良龍族、精類、和元素生物。

entries.name: 境界行者魔法
entries: 從3級開始，當你在本職業升至特定等級，你將學會額外的法術，如境界行者法術表所示。這些法術對你而言視作遊俠法術，但並不會計入你已知遊俠法術的數量中。

entries.name: 偵測傳送門
entries: 在3級時，你獲得以魔法感知位面傳送門存在的能力。以一個動作，你偵測出距離你1哩內最近的位面傳送門的距離以及方位。
一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前你都不能再使用它。
參見《地下城主指南》第二章的「位面旅行」章節以查看關於位面傳送門的例子。

entries.name: 位面戰士
entries: 在3級時，你學會汲取多元宇宙中的能量以增強你的攻擊。
以一個附贈動作，選擇一個距離你30呎內且你所能看見的生物。下一次你在該回合以一次武器攻擊命中該生物時，該攻擊所造成的所有傷害都將變成力場傷害，且該生物將受到來自該攻擊的額外{@dice 1d8}力場傷害。當你在本職業升至11級時，這個額外傷害將增加至{@dice 2d8}。

entries.name: 靈界漫步
entries: 在7級時，你學會跨入乙太位面。以一個附贈動作，你能夠以此能力施放{@spell 跨入乙太界}法術，無須消耗法術位。但此法術將在當回合結束時結束。
一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 閃現打擊
entries: 在11級時，你獲得在眨眼間穿梭於位面間的能力。當你採取{@action 攻擊}動作時，你可以在每次攻擊之前傳送最多10呎距離到一處你所能看見的未被佔據空間。
若你以該動作攻擊了至少二個不同的生物，你可以再額外對第三個生物進行一次攻擊。

entries.name: 虛體防禦
entries: 在15級時，你穿梭在位面之間的能力讓你得以溜進位面邊界以減輕你在戰鬥中所受到的傷害。當你受到來自於一次攻擊的傷害時，你可以使用你的反應以讓你自己獲得所有對這回合該攻擊傷害的抗性。

subclassFeatures.name: 怪物殺手
entries: 你致力於獵殺那些黑夜中的怪物和邪惡魔法的施行者。一名怪物殺手尋覓著吸血鬼、龍、邪惡精類、邪魔、以及其他魔法威脅。受過用以戰勝這類怪物的超自然技術訓練，怪物殺手精通於找出並擊敗那些強大且神秘的敵人。

entries.name: 怪物殺手魔法
entries: 從3級開始，當你在本職業升至特定等級，你將學會額外的法術，如怪物殺手法術表所示。這些法術對你而言視作遊俠法術，但並不會計入你已知遊俠法術的數量中。

entries.name: 獵人感知
entries: 在3級時，你獲得凝視一個生物並以魔法知悉傷害它最佳的方式的能力。以一個動作，選擇一個距離你60呎內且你所能看見的生物。你將立刻知道該生物是否擁有任何傷害免疫、抗性、或是易傷，以及它們的種類。若該生物不受預言系魔法影響，則你感知到的結果將會是它不具有任何傷害免疫、抗性、和易傷。
你可以使用此能力的次數等同於你的睿知調整值（最少一次）。你在完成一次長休後恢復所有你花費掉的次數。

entries.name: 殺手獵物
entries: 從3級開始，你可以專注你的憤怒於單一敵人，增加你對它所造成的傷害。以一個附贈動作，你指定一個距離你60呎內且你所能看見的生物做為此能力的目標。每個回合當你第一次以武器攻擊命中目標時，它將額外受到來自該武器的{@dice 1d6}傷害。
這個好處將持續直到你完成一次短休或長休，或在你指定另一個不同生物做為目標時提早結束。

entries.name: 超常防禦
entries: 在7級時，你獲得額外的韌性以抵抗你獵物對你身體和精神所做出的侵襲。每當你殺手獵物所指定的目標強迫你進行一次豁免檢定，或每當你進行一次屬性檢定以嘗試脫離該目標的擒抱，骰{@dice 1d6}並將其加入你的擲骰結果中。

entries.name: 魔法剋星
entries: 在11級時，你獲得阻撓其他人魔法的能力。當你看見一個距離你60呎內的生物施放法術或傳送，你可以使用你的反應以嘗試以魔法挫敗它。該生物必須成功通過一次對抗你法術豁免DC的睿知豁免，否則它的法術或傳送將失敗並被浪費。
一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 殺手反制
entries: 在15級時，你獲得在你的獵物嘗試妨害你時展開反擊的能力。若你殺手獵物所指定的目標強迫你進行一次豁免檢定，你可以使用你的反應以對該獵物進行一次武器攻擊。你在進行該豁免檢定之前立刻進行此攻擊。若你的攻擊命中，則除了該攻擊原本的效果之外，你的豁免檢定也將自動成功。

Rough and wild looking, a human stalks alone through the shadows of trees, hunting the orcs he knows are planning a raid on a nearby farm. Clutching a shortsword in each hand, he becomes a whirlwind of steel, cutting down one enemy after another.

After tumbling away from a cone of freezing air, an elf finds her feet and draws back her bow to loose an arrow at the white dragon. Shrugging off the wave of fear that emanates from the dragon like the cold of its breath, she sends one arrow after another to find the gaps between the dragon's thick scales.

Holding his hand high, a half-elf whistles to the hawk that circles high above him, calling the bird back to his side. Whispering instructions in Elvish, he points to the owlbear he's been tracking and sends the hawk to distract the creature while he readies his bow.

Far from the bustle of cities and towns, past the hedges that shelter the most distant farms from the terrors of the wild, amid the dense-packed trees of trackless forests and across wide and empty plains, rangers keep their unending watch.

entries.name: Deadly Hunters
entries: Warriors of the wilderness, rangers specialize in hunting the monsters that threaten the edges of civilization—humanoid raiders, rampaging beasts and monstrosities, terrible giants, and deadly dragons. They learn to track their quarry as a predator does, moving stealthily through the wilds and hiding themselves in brush and rubble. Rangers focus their combat training on techniques that are particularly useful against their specific favored foes.

Thanks to their familiarity with the wilds, rangers acquire the ability to cast spells that harness nature's power, much as a druid does. Their spells, like their combat abilities, emphasize speed, stealth, and the hunt. A ranger's talents and abilities are honed with deadly focus on the grim task of protecting the borderlands.

entries.name: Independent Adventurers
entries: Though a ranger might make a living as a hunter, a guide, or a tracker, a ranger's true calling is to defend the outskirts of civilization from the ravages of monsters and humanoid hordes that press in from the wild. In some places, rangers gather in secretive orders or join forces with druidic circles. Many rangers, though, are independent almost to a fault, knowing that, when a dragon or a band of orcs attacks, a ranger might be the first—and possibly the last—line of defense.

This fierce independence makes rangers well suited to adventuring, since they are accustomed to life far from the comforts of a dry bed and a hot bath. Faced with city-bred adventurers who grouse and whine about the hardships of the wild, rangers respond with some mixture of amusement, frustration, and compassion. But they quickly learn that other adventurers who can carry their own weight in a fight against civilization's foes are worth any extra burden. Coddled city folk might not know how to feed themselves or find fresh water in the wild, but they make up for it in other ways.

entries.name: Creating a Ranger
entries: As you create your ranger character, consider the nature of the training that gave you your particular capabilities. Did you train with a single mentor, wandering the wilds together until you mastered the ranger's ways? Did you leave your apprenticeship, or was your mentor slain—perhaps by the same kind of monster that became your favored enemy? Or perhaps you learned your skills as part of a band of rangers affiliated with a druidic circle, trained in mystic paths as well as wilderness lore. You might be self-taught, a recluse who learned combat skills, tracking, and even a magical connection to nature through the necessity of surviving in the wilds.

What's the source of your particular hatred of a certain kind of enemy? Did a monster kill someone you loved or destroy your home village? Or did you see too much of the destruction these monsters cause and commit yourself to reining in their depredations? Is your adventuring career a continuation of your work in protecting the borderlands, or a significant change? What made you join up with a band of adventurers? Do you find it challenging to teach new allies the ways of the wild, or do you welcome the relief from solitude that they offer?

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a ranger quickly by following these suggestions. First, make Dexterity your highest ability score, followed by Wisdom. (Some rangers who focus on two-weapon fighting make Strength higher than Dexterity.) Second, choose the {@background outlander} background.

I spend a lot of my life away from civilization, keeping to its fringes to protect it. Don't assume that because I don't bend the knee to your king that I haven't done more to protect him than all his knights put together.

Rangers are free-minded wanderers and seekers who patrol the edges of civilized territory, turning back the denizens of the wild lands beyond. It is a thankless job, since their efforts are rarely understood and almost never rewarded. Yet rangers persist in their duties, never doubting that their work makes the world a safer place.

A relationship with civilization informs every ranger's personality and history. Some rangers see themselves as enforcers of the law and bringers of justice on civilization's frontier, answering to no sovereign power. Others are survivalists who eschew civilization altogether. They vanquish monsters to keep themselves safe while they live in and travel through the perilous wild areas of the world. If their efforts also benefit the kingdoms and other civilized realms that they avoid, so be it.
If you're creating or playing a ranger character, the following sections offer ideas for embellishing the character and enhancing your roleplaying experience.

entries.name: View of the World
entries: A ranger's view of the world begins (and sometimes ends) with that character's outlook toward civilized folk and the places they occupy. Some rangers have an attitude toward civilization that's deeply rooted in disdain, while others pity the people they have sworn to protect—though on the battlefield, it's impossible to tell the difference between one ranger and another. Indeed, to those who have seen them operate and been the beneficiaries of their prowess, it scarcely matters why rangers do what they do. That said, no two rangers are likely to express their opinions on any matter in the same way.

If you haven't yet thought about the details of your character's worldview, consider putting a finer point on things by summarizing that viewpoint in a short statement (such as the entries on the following table). How might that feeling affect the way you conduct yourself?

entries.caption: View of the World
rows: Towns and cities are the best places for those who can't survive on their own.
The advancement of civilization is the best way to thwart chaos, but its reach must be monitored.
Towns and cities are a necessary evil, but once the wilderness is purged of supernatural threats, we will need them no more.
Walls are for cowards, who huddle behind them while others do the work of making the world safe.
Visiting a town is not unpleasant, but after a few days I feel the irresistible call to return to the wild.
Cities breed weakness by isolating folk from the harsh lessons of the wild.

entries.name: Homelands
entries: All rangers, regardless of how they came to take up the profession, have a strong connection to the natural world and its various terrains. For some rangers, the wilderness is where they grew up, either as a result of being born there or moving there at a young age. For other rangers, civilization was originally home, but the wilderness became a second homeland.

Think of your character's backstory and decide what terrain feels most like home, whether or not you were born there. What does that terrain say about your personality? Does it influence which spells you choose to learn? Have your experiences there shaped who your favored enemies are?

entries.caption: Homelands
rows: You patrolled an ancient forest, darkened and corrupted by several crossings to the Shadowfell.
As part of a group of nomads, you acquired the skills for surviving in the desert.
Your early life in the Underdark prepared you for the challenges of combating its denizens.
You dwelled on the edge of a swamp, in an area imperiled by land creatures as well as aquatic ones.
Because you grew up among the peaks, finding the best path through the mountains is second nature to you.
You wandered the far north, learning how to protect yourself and prosper in a realm overrun by ice.

entries.name: Sworn Enemy
entries: Every ranger begins with a favored enemy (or two). The determination of a favored enemy might be tied to a specific event in the character's early life, or it might be entirely a matter of choice.
What spurred your character to select a particular enemy? Was the choice made because of tradition or curiosity, or do you have a grudge to settle?

entries.caption: Sworn Enemies
rows: You seek revenge on nature's behalf for the great transgressions your foe has committed.
Your forebears or predecessors fought these creatures, and so shall you.
You bear no enmity toward your foe. You stalk such creatures as a hunter tracks down a wild animal.
You find your foe fascinating, and you collect books of tales and history concerning it.
You collect tokens of your fallen enemies to remind you of each kill.
You respect your chosen enemy, and you see your battles as a test of respective skills.

default: (a)一件{@item 鱗甲|phb} 或 (b)一件{@item 皮甲|phb}
(a)二把{@item 短劍|phb} 或 (b)二把{@filter 簡易近戰武器|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon;melee weapon}
(a)一套{@item 地城探險家套裝|phb} 或 (b)一套{@item 探索者套裝|phb}
一把{@item 長弓|phb}和一個裝有{@item 箭(20)|phb|20支箭}的{@item 箭袋|phb}

classFeatures.name: 宿敵
entries: 從1級開始，你在對荒野中經常遭遇到的一個特定類型敵人的研究、追跡、狩獵、和甚至交談上已相當具備充足的經驗。

選擇一個宿敵類型：{@filter 野獸|bestiary|type=beast}、{@filter 精類|bestiary|type=fey}、{@filter 類人生物|bestiary|type=humanoid}、{@filter 怪獸|bestiary|type=monstrosity}、或{@filter 不死生物|bestiary|type=undead}。你對所選類型的生物所進行的武器攻擊的傷害骰獲得+2加值。此外，你在用於追蹤你宿敵的睿知（{@skill 求生}）檢定、以及用以回憶關於它們情報的智力檢定中具有優勢。
當你獲得此能力時，你同時學會一種你所選擇的語言，這個語言通常會是你的宿敵、或與之有關的生物所使用的語言。然而，你可以自由選擇任意一種你想要學會的語言。

classFeatures.name: 自然探索者
entries: 你熟練於在自然世界中領航帶路，且你在被襲擊時也能迅速而果斷的做出反應。這賦予了你下列好處：

items: 你無視困難地形。
你在先攻檢定中具有優勢。
在你戰鬥中的第一個回合，你在對任何尚未行動的生物所進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

entries: 此外，你精通於在荒野中領航。當旅行長達1個小時或更久，你將獲得下列好處：

items: 困難地形不會減慢你們團隊的旅行速度。
除非是因為魔法的緣故，否則你們團隊不會迷路。
即使你在旅行途中正從事於其他行動（像是覓食、導航、或追跡），你仍保持對危險的警戒。
若你正獨自旅行，你能夠以正常步調隱匿移動。
當你覓食時，你能找到二倍你原本所能找到的食物。
當你追跡其他生物時，你也能得知它們確切的數量、它們的體型、以及它們在多久之前經過這片區域。

classFeatures.name: 施法
entries: 在你升至2級時，你學會如同德魯伊的方式使用大自然的精粹以施放法術。請參閱{@book 第十章|PHB|10}以了解關於施法的規則，以及第十一章以查閱{@filter 遊俠法術列表|spells|class=ranger}。

entries.name: 法術位
entries: 遊俠表中顯示了你有多少個法術位可以用來施放你一環或更高環的{@filter 遊俠法術|spells|class=ranger}。要施放其中一個法術，你必須消耗一個與該法術環階相同或更高的法術位。你在完成一次長休後恢復所有你花費掉的法術位。
舉例來說，如果你知曉一個1環的{@spell 化獸為友}法術，且你擁有一個1環和一個2環的法術位，則你可以使用其中任意一個法術位來施放{@spell 化獸為友}。

entries.name: 一環或更高環的已知法術
entries: 你知曉二個從遊俠法術列表中自選的1環法術。
遊俠表中的已知法術欄位顯示你將在何時學習到更多自選的遊俠法術。每個這些法術的環階都必須符合你所擁有法術位的環階。舉例來說，當你在此職業升至5級時，你可以學習一個新的1環或2環法術。
此外，當你提升這個職業的等級時，你可以從遊俠的法術列表中挑選一個法術來取代一個你目前已知的法術，而它的環階也必須符合你所擁有法術位的環階。

entries.name: 施法屬性
entries: 由於你的魔法是源自你與大自然的協調，睿知是你施展遊俠法術的施法屬性。每當法術提及你的施法屬性時，你將使用你的睿知。此外，當決定你遊俠法術的豁免DC、以及使用遊俠法術進行攻擊檢定時，你使用你的睿知調整值。

classFeatures.name: 戰鬥風格
entries: 在2級時，你採用一種特殊的戰鬥風格以做為你的專業。從下列選項中選擇一種。你不能獲得相同的戰鬥風格選項超過一次，即使你有機會再選擇它也一樣。

entries.name: 弓道
entries: 你在使用遠程武器進行的攻擊檢定中獲得+2加值。

entries.name: 近身射手
entries: 當你在距離一個敵意生物5呎以內時進行一次遠程攻擊，你在該攻擊檢定中並不會具有劣勢。你的遠程攻擊忽略距離你30呎內目標的半掩護和四分之三掩護。你在遠程攻擊的攻擊檢定中獲得+1加值。

entries.name: 防禦
entries: 當你穿戴護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值。

entries.name: 決鬥
entries: 當你單手持用一把近戰武器，且沒有持用其他武器時，你在使用該武器所進行的傷害骰中獲得+2加值。

entries.name: 水手
entries: 只要你未穿戴重甲或使用盾牌，你就擁有等同於你正常移動速度的游泳速度和攀爬速度，且你的AC獲得+1加值。

entries.name: 坑道鬥士
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你可以進入防禦架式並持續直到你的下個回合開始。當你處於防禦架式時，你可以進行藉機攻擊而無需使用你的反應，且你可以處於你觸及範圍內的生物移動超過5呎時使用你的反應對它進行一次近戰攻擊。

entries.name: 雙武器戰鬥
entries: 當你進行雙武器戰鬥時，你可以將你的屬性調整值加入第二次攻擊的傷害中。

classFeatures.name: 原初意識
entries: 從3級開始，你在遊俠學識上的專業讓你得以建立一道與你周圍野獸和環境之間的連結。
你具有一種與野獸交流的天賦能力，且它們將視你為精神上的同類。透過聲音和姿勢，你能夠以一個動作對一個野獸傳達簡單的想法，並可以理解它基本的情緒和意圖。你能得知它的情緒狀態、判斷它是否受到任何魔法的影響、它的短期需求（像是食物或安全的場所）、且你得知你要說服它不攻擊所應採取的行動（若有）。
你不能對一個你在最近10分鐘內曾經攻擊過的生物使用這個能力。
此外，你可以調整你的感官以判斷附近是否潛伏著你的宿敵。透過花費1分鐘不受干擾的專注（如同專注於法術），你可以感知到是否有任何宿敵存在於距離你5哩內的區域之中。這能力將揭露出你的宿敵是否存在、它們的數量、以及這些生物離你大致的方向和距離（以哩為單位）。
若範圍中有複數個宿敵群體，則你將得知它們各自的情報。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠密會
entries: 在3級時，你從可選密會列表中選擇一種你致力於達成的理想範型。你的選擇將在3級、5級、7級、11級、和15級時賦予你新的能力。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至4級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠密會能力
entries: 在5級時，你獲得一個由你遊俠密會所賦予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 高等宿敵
entries: 在6級時，你已經準備好狩獵更加致命的獵物。選擇一個高等宿敵類型：{@filter 異怪|bestiary|type=aberration}、{@filter 天界生物|bestiary|type=celestial}、{@filter 構裝|bestiary|type=construct}、{@filter 龍|bestiary|type=dragon}、{@filter 元素|bestiary|type=elemental}、{@filter 邪魔|bestiary|type=fiend}、或{@filter 巨人|bestiary|type=giant}。你獲得所有你在獲得宿敵能力時所會獲得的好處，包括一種額外語言。你對你所有宿敵的傷害骰加值提升至+4。
此外，你在對抗任何高等宿敵所使用的法術和能力時所進行豁免檢定中具有優勢。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠密會能力
entries: 在7級時，你獲得一個由你遊俠密會所賦予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至8級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 輕盈步伐
entries: 從8級開始，你可以在你的回合以一個附贈動作採取{@action 疾走}動作。

classFeatures.name: 避人耳目
entries: 從10級開始，你可以長時間保持完美的靜止以發動伏擊。
當你嘗試在你的回合躲藏時，你可以選擇不在該回合進行移動。若你不進行移動，則直到你的下個回合開始，其他生物在嘗試察覺你所進行的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定中將承受-10的罰值。無論是自願或因為某些外部效果所致，一旦你移動或倒下{@condition 伏地}，則你將失去這個好處。若任何效果或動作使你不再躲藏，則你仍將自動被察覺。
若你在你的下個回合仍然保持躲藏，你可以持續維持不動以在被察覺之前繼續獲得這個好處。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠密會能力
entries: 在11級時，你獲得一個由你遊俠密會所賦予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至12級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 無蹤步
entries: 從14級開始，你可以在你的回合以一個附贈動作採取{@action 躲藏}動作。同時，你不會被非魔法的手段追蹤，除非你選擇留下蹤跡。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠密會能力
entries: 在15級時，你獲得一個由你遊俠密會所賦予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至16級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 野性感官
entries: 在18級時，你獲得超自然的感官以幫助你對抗看不見的生物。當你攻擊一個你看不見的生物時，你並不會因為無法看見它而在你對它進行的攻擊檢定中承受劣勢。同時，只要該生物沒有躲藏於你，且你不處於{@condition 目盲}或{@condition 耳聾}狀態，則你也能察覺到任何距離你30呎內{@condition 隱形}生物的位置。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至19級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 眾敵屠戮
entries: 在20級時，你成為了一名無可匹敵的獵手。在你的每個回合一次，你可以將你的睿知調整值加到你所進行的一次攻擊檢定或傷害骰中。你可以選擇在擲骰之前或之後使用此能力，但是必須在任何擲骰效果適用之前使用。

subclassFeatures.name: 野獸密會(UA)
entries: 許多遊俠在野外比在文明中會更加自在，以至於甚至動物們會將他們視為同類。野獸密會的遊俠們與一頭野獸建立起了緊密的聯繫，並透過魔法進一步強化了這種聯繫。

entries.name: 動物夥伴
entries: 在3級時，你習得使用你的魔法以和一頭自然世界中的生物建立一道強大的聯繫。

藉由8小時的作業以及消耗價值50金幣的稀有草藥和上好食物，你可以從荒野中喚來一頭野獸作為你忠實的夥伴。通常來說，你會從下列動物中選擇你的夥伴：{@creature 猿}、{@creature 黑熊}、{@creature 野豬}、{@creature 巨獾}、{@creature 巨鼬鼠}、{@creature 騾子}、{@creature 黑豹}、或{@creature 狼}。然而，你的DM可能會根據周遭地形環境、並考慮能夠在該區域中合理存在的動物類型，以從這些動物中為你挑選一種。
在這8小時的活動結束時，你的動物夥伴將會出現，並獲得所有你動物夥伴聯繫能力所賦予的好處。你同時只能擁有一個動物夥伴。
若你的動物夥伴被殺死，則你與牠之間的魔法聯繫將讓你得以使牠起死回生。藉由8小時的作業並消耗價值25金幣的稀有草藥和上好食物，你可以喚回你動物夥伴的靈魂並使用你的魔法為牠窗造一具新的身體。你可以透過這個方式將你的動物夥伴起死回生，即使你沒有任何牠的身體部位也一樣。
若你當下擁有一名動物夥伴，且使用這個能力將你的前一個動物夥伴起死回生，則你當下擁有的動物夥伴將離開你，且由被復活的動物夥伴取而代之。

entries.name: 動物夥伴聯繫
entries: 你的動物夥伴將因牠與你之間的聯繫而獲得許多的好處。
若動物夥伴具有多重攻擊的動作項，則牠將失去該動作項。
動物夥伴將盡其所能地服從你的命令。它將如同其他生物一樣骰自己的先攻，但由你決定牠的動作、選擇、態度，諸如此類。若你陷入{@condition 無力}或不在場，則你的動物夥伴將自己行動。
當你使用你的自然探索者能力時，你和你的動物夥伴都能夠以正常步調隱匿移動。
你動物夥伴的能力和遊戲數據將有一部份是由你的等級決定。你的動物夥伴使用你的熟練加值，而非牠自己的。除了原本會使用其熟練加值的部分之外，牠還會將其熟練加值加到牠的AC和傷害骰上。
你的動物夥伴將熟練於二個你所選擇的技能。牠同時將熟練於所有的豁免檢定。
在3級之後，你每提升一級，你的動物夥伴都將因此獲得一顆額外的生命骰，且增加牠相應的生命值。
每當你獲得屬性值提升的職業能力，你動物夥伴的屬性值也將獲得提升。你的動物夥伴可以將一項你所選擇的屬性值提升2點，或著你可以將二項你所選擇的屬性值各提升1點。如同平常一樣，除非另有說明，否則你的動物夥伴不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至20或以上。
你的動物夥伴擁有與你相同的陣營，且它具有一個個性特質和缺點，你可以從下表中選擇或擲骰決定。你的動物夥伴擁有與你相同的理念，且牠的羈絆永遠是「和我同行的遊俠是我願意為之獻身的摯愛夥伴。」
你的動物夥伴獲得你的宿敵能力、以及你在6級時獲得的高等宿敵能力所賦予的好處。牠將使用你所選擇的宿敵做為牠的宿敵。

entries.caption: 動物夥伴特質
rows: 我在面對逆境時毫不畏懼。
威脅我的朋友，就是威脅我。
我會保持警戒，讓其他人得以休息。
人們會將我視為動物並低估我。
我有著會在關鍵時刻現身登場的訣竅。
對所有的一切，我將我朋友的需求擺在我自己之前。

entries.caption: 動物夥伴缺點
rows: 如果有無人看管的食物，我就會把它吃了。
我會對陌生人低吼。而對我來說，除了我的遊俠夥伴之外，所有人都是陌生人。
任何時候都是撓肚子撒嬌的好時候。
我對於招呼的認識就是不停地舔對方的臉。
我會跳向一個生物以表示我有多愛他們！

entries.name: 偕同攻擊
entries: 從5級開始，你和你的動物夥伴將組成更加強大的戰鬥之力。當你在你的回合採取{@action 攻擊}動作時，若你的動物夥伴可以看見你，則牠可以使用牠的反應以進行一次近戰攻擊。

entries.name: 野獸防禦
entries: 在7級時，若你的動物夥伴可以看見你，則牠所進行的所有豁免檢定都將具有優勢。

entries.name: 爪牙風暴
entries: 在11級時，你的動物夥伴可以使用牠的動作對每個距離牠5呎內且牠選擇的生物進行一次近戰攻擊，為每個目標進行各自的攻擊檢定。

entries.name: 卓越野獸防禦
entries: 在15級時，每當一個你的動物夥伴可以看見的攻擊者以一次攻擊命中牠時，牠可以使用牠的反應已將該次攻擊對牠造成的傷害減半。

subclassFeatures.name: 獵人密會 (UA)
entries: 有些遊俠尋求透過精通武器以更好的從荒野的威脅中守護文明世界。獵人密會的成員學習了特化的戰鬥技巧，用以對抗最可怕的威脅：從狂怒的食人魔、成群的獸人、到高聳的巨人和可怖的巨龍。

entries.name: 狩者獵物
entries: 在3級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：巨怪獵者、巨人殺手、或滅族者。

entries.name: 巨怪獵者
entries: 你的執著可以毀滅最強大的敵人。當你以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物，若它的生命值低於最大值，則該生物將受到額外的{@dice 1d8}傷害。你每回合只能造成一次這個額外傷害。

entries.name: 巨人殺手
entries: 當一個距離你5呎內，體型為大型或更大的生物對你進行的一次攻擊命中或失手時，只要你可以看見該生物，你就可以使用你的反應以立刻在它的攻擊之後對它進行攻擊。

entries.name: 滅族者
entries: 在你的每個回合一次，當你進行一次武器攻擊時，你可以使用相同的武器對一個距離原本目標5呎內，且處於你武器射程內的另一個生物進行另一次攻擊。

entries.name: 額外攻擊
entries: 從5級開始，每當你在你的回合採取{@action 攻擊}動作，你可以攻擊二次，而非一次。

entries.name: 防禦性戰術
entries: 在7級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：逃離眾敵、防禦多重攻擊、或鋼鐵意志。

entries.name: 逃離眾敵
entries: 所有對你進行的藉機攻擊將具有劣勢。

entries.name: 防禦多重攻擊
entries: 當一個生物以一次攻擊命中你時，你的AC將對該生物在該回合中所進行的所有後續攻擊獲得+4的加值。

entries.name: 鋼鐵意志
entries: 你在對抗{@condition 恐懼}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

entries.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 在11級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：箭雨、或劍刃風暴。

entries.name: 箭雨
entries: 你可以使用你的動作以進行一次遠程攻擊，並以處於你武器射程內你所能看見一點的周圍10呎範圍內的任意數量個生物做為目標。你必須有足夠的彈藥以攻擊每個目標，且你為每個目標進行各自的攻擊檢定。

entries.name: 劍刃風暴
entries: 你可以使用你的動作以進行一次近戰攻擊，並以距離你5呎內的任意數量個生物做為目標，為每個目標進行各自的攻擊檢定。

entries.name: 卓越獵人防禦
entries: 在15級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：反射閃避、逆潮而立、或直覺閃避。

entries.name: 反射閃避
entries: 你可以靈活地躲開某些範圍效果，像是紅龍的火焰吐息、或{@spell 閃電束}法術。當你成為一個允許你進行敏捷豁免以僅承受一半傷害的效果的目標時，你改為在豁免成功時不受任何傷害，且在豁免失敗時僅承受一半傷害。

entries.name: 逆潮而立
entries: 當一個敵對生物對你進行的一次近戰攻擊失手，你可以使用你的反應以強迫該生物對你所選擇的另一個生物（除了它自己以外）重複進行一次該攻擊。

entries.name: 直覺閃避
entries: 當一個你所能看見的攻擊者使用一次攻擊命中你，你可以使用你的反應以減半該次攻擊對你的傷害。

subclassFeatures.name: 深域追跡者密會 (UA)
entries: 大部分的人們只會在最急迫情況下，為了執行艱困絕望的任務或尋求巨大的財富，才會鋌而走險進入幽暗地域的深處。通常來說，邪惡總會在這地底深處悄悄滋生，而深域追跡者密會的遊俠們則致力於在這類威脅崛起到地表世界之前就發掘並摧毀它們。

entries.name: 深域追蹤者魔法
entries: 在3級時，你獲得90呎範圍的黑暗視覺。若你已經擁有黑暗視覺，則它的範圍將增加30呎。你也在本職業升至3級、5級、9級、13級、和15級時學會額外的法術。當你獲得一個深域追跡者法術時，它對你而言將被視作遊俠法術，但並不會計入你已知遊俠法術的數量中。

entries.name: 幽暗地域斥候
entries: 在3級時，你精通於伏擊的藝術。在戰鬥中你的第一個回合期間，你的移動速度獲得+10加值，且若你在該回合採取{@action 攻擊}動作，則你可以進行一次額外攻擊。你同時擅長於避開依賴於黑暗視覺的生物。當你處於微光光照或黑暗環境時，這類生物在嘗試察覺你的存在時並不會獲得任何好處。此外，當DM要判斷你是否可以對一個生物進行躲藏時，該生物不會獲得任何來自黑暗視覺的好處。

entries.name: 額外攻擊
entries: 從5級開始，每當你在你的回合採取{@action 攻擊}動作，你可以攻擊二次，而非一次。

entries.name: 鋼鐵心智
entries: 在7級時，你獲得睿知豁免的熟練。

entries.name: 追獵如風
entries: 從11級開始，在你的每個回合一次，當你的一次攻擊失手時，你可以進行另一次攻擊。你在使用次能力的回合期間獲得一次額外的攻擊。

entries.name: 追獵者閃避
entries: 在15級時，每當一個生物對你進行一次攻擊檢定且該檢定不具有優勢時，你可以使用你的反應以讓該生物對你進行的攻擊檢定承受劣勢。你可以在該攻擊檢定擲骰之前獲知後決定是否使用此能力，但必須在決定該次檢定的結果之前使用。

Rough and wild looking, a human stalks alone through the shadows of trees, hunting the orcs he knows are planning a raid on a nearby farm. Clutching a shortsword in each hand, he becomes a whirlwind of steel, cutting down one enemy after another.

After tumbling away from a cone of freezing air, an elf finds her feet and draws back her bow to loose an arrow at the white dragon. Shrugging off the wave of fear that emanates from the dragon like the cold of its breath, she sends one arrow after another to find the gaps between the dragon's thick scales.

Holding his hand high, a half-elf whistles to the hawk that circles high above him, calling the bird back to his side. Whispering instructions in Elvish, he points to the owlbear he's been tracking and sends the hawk to distract the creature while he readies his bow.

Far from the bustle of cities and towns, past the hedges that shelter the most distant farms from the terrors of the wild, amid the dense-packed trees of trackless forests and across wide and empty plains, rangers keep their unending watch.

entries.name: Deadly Hunters
entries: Warriors of the wilderness, rangers specialize in hunting the monsters that threaten the edges of civilization—humanoid raiders, rampaging beasts and monstrosities, terrible giants, and deadly dragons. They learn to track their quarry as a predator does, moving stealthily through the wilds and hiding themselves in brush and rubble. Rangers focus their combat training on techniques that are particularly useful against their specific favored foes.

Thanks to their familiarity with the wilds, rangers acquire the ability to cast spells that harness nature's power, much as a druid does. Their spells, like their combat abilities, emphasize speed, stealth, and the hunt. A ranger's talents and abilities are honed with deadly focus on the grim task of protecting the borderlands.

entries.name: Independent Adventurers
entries: Though a ranger might make a living as a hunter, a guide, or a tracker, a ranger's true calling is to defend the outskirts of civilization from the ravages of monsters and humanoid hordes that press in from the wild. In some places, rangers gather in secretive orders or join forces with druidic circles. Many rangers, though, are independent almost to a fault, knowing that, when a dragon or a band of orcs attacks, a ranger might be the first—and possibly the last—line of defense.

This fierce independence makes rangers well suited to adventuring, since they are accustomed to life far from the comforts of a dry bed and a hot bath. Faced with city-bred adventurers who grouse and whine about the hardships of the wild, rangers respond with some mixture of amusement, frustration, and compassion. But they quickly learn that other adventurers who can carry their own weight in a fight against civilization's foes are worth any extra burden. Coddled city folk might not know how to feed themselves or find fresh water in the wild, but they make up for it in other ways.

entries.name: Creating a Ranger
entries: As you create your ranger character, consider the nature of the training that gave you your particular capabilities. Did you train with a single mentor, wandering the wilds together until you mastered the ranger's ways? Did you leave your apprenticeship, or was your mentor slain—perhaps by the same kind of monster that became your favored enemy? Or perhaps you learned your skills as part of a band of rangers affiliated with a druidic circle, trained in mystic paths as well as wilderness lore. You might be self-taught, a recluse who learned combat skills, tracking, and even a magical connection to nature through the necessity of surviving in the wilds.

What's the source of your particular hatred of a certain kind of enemy? Did a monster kill someone you loved or destroy your home village? Or did you see too much of the destruction these monsters cause and commit yourself to reining in their depredations? Is your adventuring career a continuation of your work in protecting the borderlands, or a significant change? What made you join up with a band of adventurers? Do you find it challenging to teach new allies the ways of the wild, or do you welcome the relief from solitude that they offer?

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a ranger quickly by following these suggestions. First, make Dexterity your highest ability score, followed by Wisdom. (Some rangers who focus on two-weapon fighting make Strength higher than Dexterity.) Second, choose the {@background outlander} background.

I spend a lot of my life away from civilization, keeping to its fringes to protect it. Don't assume that because I don't bend the knee to your king that I haven't done more to protect him than all his knights put together.

Rangers are free-minded wanderers and seekers who patrol the edges of civilized territory, turning back the denizens of the wild lands beyond. It is a thankless job, since their efforts are rarely understood and almost never rewarded. Yet rangers persist in their duties, never doubting that their work makes the world a safer place.

A relationship with civilization informs every ranger's personality and history. Some rangers see themselves as enforcers of the law and bringers of justice on civilization's frontier, answering to no sovereign power. Others are survivalists who eschew civilization altogether. They vanquish monsters to keep themselves safe while they live in and travel through the perilous wild areas of the world. If their efforts also benefit the kingdoms and other civilized realms that they avoid, so be it.
If you're creating or playing a ranger character, the following sections offer ideas for embellishing the character and enhancing your roleplaying experience.

entries.name: View of the World
entries: A ranger's view of the world begins (and sometimes ends) with that character's outlook toward civilized folk and the places they occupy. Some rangers have an attitude toward civilization that's deeply rooted in disdain, while others pity the people they have sworn to protect—though on the battlefield, it's impossible to tell the difference between one ranger and another. Indeed, to those who have seen them operate and been the beneficiaries of their prowess, it scarcely matters why rangers do what they do. That said, no two rangers are likely to express their opinions on any matter in the same way.

If you haven't yet thought about the details of your character's worldview, consider putting a finer point on things by summarizing that viewpoint in a short statement (such as the entries on the following table). How might that feeling affect the way you conduct yourself?

entries.caption: View of the World
rows: Towns and cities are the best places for those who can't survive on their own.
The advancement of civilization is the best way to thwart chaos, but its reach must be monitored.
Towns and cities are a necessary evil, but once the wilderness is purged of supernatural threats, we will need them no more.
Walls are for cowards, who huddle behind them while others do the work of making the world safe.
Visiting a town is not unpleasant, but after a few days I feel the irresistible call to return to the wild.
Cities breed weakness by isolating folk from the harsh lessons of the wild.

entries.name: Homelands
entries: All rangers, regardless of how they came to take up the profession, have a strong connection to the natural world and its various terrains. For some rangers, the wilderness is where they grew up, either as a result of being born there or moving there at a young age. For other rangers, civilization was originally home, but the wilderness became a second homeland.

Think of your character's backstory and decide what terrain feels most like home, whether or not you were born there. What does that terrain say about your personality? Does it influence which spells you choose to learn? Have your experiences there shaped who your favored enemies are?

entries.caption: Homelands
rows: You patrolled an ancient forest, darkened and corrupted by several crossings to the Shadowfell.
As part of a group of nomads, you acquired the skills for surviving in the desert.
Your early life in the Underdark prepared you for the challenges of combating its denizens.
You dwelled on the edge of a swamp, in an area imperiled by land creatures as well as aquatic ones.
Because you grew up among the peaks, finding the best path through the mountains is second nature to you.
You wandered the far north, learning how to protect yourself and prosper in a realm overrun by ice.

entries.name: Sworn Enemy
entries: Every ranger begins with a favored enemy (or two). The determination of a favored enemy might be tied to a specific event in the character's early life, or it might be entirely a matter of choice.
What spurred your character to select a particular enemy? Was the choice made because of tradition or curiosity, or do you have a grudge to settle?

entries.caption: Sworn Enemies
rows: You seek revenge on nature's behalf for the great transgressions your foe has committed.
Your forebears or predecessors fought these creatures, and so shall you.
You bear no enmity toward your foe. You stalk such creatures as a hunter tracks down a wild animal.
You find your foe fascinating, and you collect books of tales and history concerning it.
You collect tokens of your fallen enemies to remind you of each kill.
You respect your chosen enemy, and you see your battles as a test of respective skills.

default: (a)一件{@item 鱗甲|phb} 或 (b)一件{@item 皮甲|phb}
(a)二把{@item 短劍|phb} 或 (b)二把{@filter 簡易近戰武器|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon;melee weapon}
(a)一套{@item 地城探險家套裝|phb} 或 (b)一套{@item 探索者套裝|phb}
一把{@item 長弓|phb}和一個裝有{@item 箭(20)|phb|20支箭}的{@item 箭袋|phb}

classFeatures.name: 宿敵
entries: 從1級開始，你在對一個特定類型敵人的研究、追跡、狩獵、和甚至交談上已相當具備充足的經驗。

選擇一個宿敵類型：{@filter 異怪|bestiary|type=aberration}、{@filter 野獸|bestiary|type=beast}、{@filter 天界生物|bestiary|type=celestial}、{@filter 構裝體|bestiary|type=construct}、{@filter 龍|bestiary|type=dragon}、{@filter 元素|bestiary|type=elemental}、{@filter 精類|bestiary|type=fey}、{@filter 邪魔|bestiary|type=fiend}、{@filter 巨人|bestiary|type=giant}、{@filter 怪獸|bestiary|type=monstrosity}、{@filter 泥怪|bestiary|type=ooze}、{@filter 植物|bestiary|type=plant}、或{@filter 不死生物|bestiary|type=undead}。或者，你可以選擇二個{@filter 類人生物|bestiary|type=humanoid}種族（像是{@creature 豺狼人|mm}和{@creature 獸人|mm}）做為宿敵。
你在用於追蹤你宿敵的睿知（{@skill 求生}）檢定、以及用以回憶關於它們情報的智力檢定中具有優勢。
當你獲得此能力時，若你的宿敵擁有至少一種語言，你也選擇學會一種被它們所使用的語言。
你在6級和14級時選擇一種額外的宿敵以及一種關聯語言。隨著你提升等級，你的選擇必須反映你在你冒險中所遭遇過的怪物類型。

classFeatures.name: 自然探索者
entries: 你特別熟悉於一種自然環境，且熟稔在這類區域中旅行和生存的方式。選擇一種偏好環境：極地、海岸、沙漠、森林、草地、高山、沼澤、或幽暗地域。當你進行一次關聯於你偏好環境的智力或睿知檢定時，若你使用一個你所熟練的技能，則你的熟練加值變為二倍。
當在你的偏好環境中旅行長達1個小時或更久，你將獲得下列好處：

items: 困難地形不會減慢你們團隊的旅行速度。
除非是因為魔法的緣故，否則你們團隊不會迷路。
即使你在旅行途中正從事於其他行動（像是覓食、導航、或追跡），你仍保持對危險的警戒。
若你正獨自旅行，你能夠以正常步調隱匿移動。
當你覓食時，你能找到二倍你原本所能找到的食物。
當你追跡其他生物時，你也能得知它們確切的數量、它們的體型、以及它們在多久之前經過這片區域。

entries: 你在6級和10級時選擇一種額外的偏好環境。

classFeatures.name: 戰鬥風格
entries: 在2級時，你採用一種特殊的戰鬥風格以做為你的專業。從下列選項中選擇一種。你不能獲得相同的戰鬥風格選項超過一次，即使你有機會再選擇它也一樣。

entries.name: 弓道
entries: 你在使用遠程武器進行的攻擊檢定中獲得+2加值。

entries.name: 近身射手
entries: 當你在距離一個敵意生物5呎以內時進行一次遠程攻擊，你在該攻擊檢定中並不會具有劣勢。你的遠程攻擊忽略距離你30呎內目標的半掩護和四分之三掩護。你在遠程攻擊的攻擊檢定中獲得+1加值。

entries.name: 防禦
entries: 當你穿戴護甲時，你的AC獲得+1加值。

entries.name: 決鬥
entries: 當你單手持用一把近戰武器，且沒有持用其他武器時，你在使用該武器所進行的傷害骰中獲得+2加值。

entries.name: 水手
entries: 只要你未穿戴重甲或使用盾牌，你就擁有等同於你正常移動速度的游泳速度和攀爬速度，且你的AC獲得+1加值。

entries.name: 坑道鬥士
entries: 以一個附贈動作，你可以進入防禦架式並持續直到你的下個回合開始。當你處於防禦架式時，你可以進行藉機攻擊而無需使用你的反應，且你可以處於你觸及範圍內的生物移動超過5呎時使用你的反應對它進行一次近戰攻擊。

entries.name: 雙武器戰鬥
entries: 當你進行雙武器戰鬥時，你可以將你的屬性調整值加入第二次攻擊的傷害中。

classFeatures.name: 戰鬥卓越
entries: 在2級時，你學會各種戰技，並藉由被稱作卓越骰的特殊骰子驅動它們。

entries.name: 戰技
entries: 你學會二個自選戰技，從戰士的戰鬥大師範型的可選戰技列表中選擇。許多戰技將以某些方式強化一次攻擊。你只能為每次攻擊使用一種戰技。
你將在5級、9級、13級、和17級時學會一個額外的戰技。每次你學會新的戰技時，你也可以將一個你已知的戰技取代成另一個不同的戰技。

entries.name: 卓越骰
entries: 你擁有四顆卓越骰，這四顆卓越骰為d8。卓越骰將在你使用戰技時被花費。你在完成一次短休或長休後恢復你花費掉的卓越骰。
你將在9級、和17級時再獲得一顆額外的卓越骰。

entries.name: 豁免檢定
entries: 你的部分戰技會要求你的目標進行一次豁免檢定以對抗戰技的效果。這個豁免檢定DC的計算方式如下：

classFeatures.name: 遊俠範型
entries: 在3級時，你從可選範型列表中選擇一種你致力於達成的範型。你的選擇將在3級、7級、11級、和15級時賦予你新的能力。

classFeatures.name: 原初意識
entries: 從3級開始，你可以使用你的動作以集中你的意識於你周遭的區域。在接下來一分鐘內，你可以感知下列類型的生物是否存在於距離你1哩內的區域（或若處於你的偏好環境則為6哩內）：異怪、天界生物、龍、元素、精類、邪魔、和不死生物。此能力無法揭露出該生物的位置和數量。
一旦你使用這個能力，你將必須完成一次短休或長休才能再次使用它。

classFeatures.name: 草藥敷劑
entries: 在3級時，你可以製造一種特殊的草藥敷劑，蘊含著可與某些藥水匹配的治癒能量。你可以花費1小時的時間收集藥草並預備醫護繃帶，以製造出數量等同於你睿知調整值(最少為1)的草藥敷劑。你同時可以攜帶最多等同於你睿知調整值(最少為1)數量的草藥敷劑。你所製造的這些敷劑無法由你以外的人塗抹使用。在24小時之後，所有你尚未使用的敷劑都將失去效力。
若你花費1分鐘的時間將你的其中一個敷劑塗抹在一個受傷的類人生物身上，則你每有兩級遊俠等級，該生物就會回復{@dice 1d6}的生命值。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至4級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 額外攻擊
entries: 從5級開始，每當你在你的回合採取{@action 攻擊}動作，你可以攻擊二次，而非一次。

classFeatures.name: 額外戰技
entries: 在5級時，你學會一個你所選擇的額外戰技，從戰士的戰鬥大師範型的可選戰技列表中選擇。

classFeatures.name: 宿敵和自然探索者強化
classFeatures.ENG_name: Favored Enemy and Natural Explorer improvements
entries: 在6級時，你獲得一種額外的偏好環境。
在6級時，你選擇一種額外的宿敵以及一種關聯語言。你的選擇必須反映你在你冒險中所遭遇過的怪物類型。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠範型能力
entries: 在7級時，你獲得一個由你遊俠範型所賦予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至8級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 大地行者
entries: 從8級開始，移動穿過非魔法的困難地形並不會花費你額外的移動速度。你也可以穿越非魔法植物而不會被它們減緩速度，若它們是荊棘、棘刺、或其他類似危險，你也不會被它們的傷害。
此外，在對抗由魔法創造或控制的植物所造成的阻礙移動效果時（像是{@spell 糾纏術}法術創造出的植物），你所進行的豁免檢定具有優勢。

classFeatures.name: 天然血清
entries: 從9級開始，你在對抗毒素的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且具有對毒素傷害的抗性。此外，當你使用你的其中一個草藥敷劑塗抹在生物身上以回復它的生命值時，你也可以治療它身上的一種毒素效果。

classFeatures.name: 額外戰技
entries: 在9級時，你學會一個你所選擇的額外戰技，從戰士的戰鬥大師範型的可選戰技列表中選擇。

classFeatures.name: 避人耳目
entries: 從10級開始，你可以花費1分鐘的時間為自己創造一個偽裝。你必須要能取用新鮮的泥巴、土壤、植物、煙灰、和其他自然產出的材料以創造你的偽裝。
一旦你透過這個方式偽裝，你可以透過將自己貼合於一個高度和寬度至少與你一樣大的固體表面上，例如樹木或牆壁，以嘗試進行躲藏。只要你待於該處且不移動或採取動作，你就在敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中獲得+10的加值。一旦你移動或採取動作或反應，你就必須再次偽裝自己以獲得這個好處。

classFeatures.name: 自然探索者強化
entries: 在10級時，你獲得一種額外的偏好環境。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠範型能力
entries: 在11級時，你獲得一個由你遊俠範型所賦予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至12級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 呼喚自然盟友
entries: 從13級開始，當你處於你偏好環境的區域時，你可以從環境中呼喚自然生物為你而戰，利用你與自然世界的協調說服牠們協助你。由DM從那些距離你1哩內，能夠聽見你的野獸中，選擇適合生存於該環境中的野獸以出來協助你，牠們屬於下列其中一種組合：

items: 一隻{@filter 挑戰等級2或以下的野獸|bestiary|challenge rating=2|type=beast|miscellaneous=!swarm}
二隻{@filter 挑戰等級1或以下的野獸|bestiary|challenge rating=1|type=beast|miscellaneous=!swarm}
四隻{@filter 挑戰等級1/2或以下的野獸|bestiary|challenge rating=1/2|type=beast|miscellaneous=!swarm}
八隻{@filter 挑戰等級1/4或以下的野獸|bestiary|challenge rating=0;1/8;1/4|type=beast|miscellaneous=!swarm}

entries: 這些野獸將會從牠們當前所在的場所接近你，並會與你並肩作戰，攻擊任何與你敵對的生物。牠們對你和你的同伴友善，且牠們在骰先攻時作為一組擲骰，但有著各自的回合。這些生物的數據資料由DM掌控。
在1小時之後．這些野獸將會返回牠們先前的場所。一旦你使用這個能力，則因為同樣的動物不會再重複響應你的呼喚，你在24小時內將無法再在相同的區域內使用這個能力。

classFeatures.name: 額外戰技
entries: 在13級時，你學會一個你所選擇的額外戰技，從戰士的戰鬥大師範型的可選戰技列表中選擇。

classFeatures.name: 無蹤步
entries: 從14級開始，你可以在你的回合以一個附贈動作採取{@action 躲藏}動作。同時，你不會被非魔法的手段追蹤，除非你選擇留下蹤跡。

classFeatures.name: 宿敵強化
entries: 在14級時，你選擇一種額外的宿敵以及一種關聯語言。你的選擇必須反映你在你冒險中所遭遇過的怪物類型。

classFeatures.name: 遊俠範型能力
entries: 在15級時，你獲得一個由你遊俠範型所賦予的能力。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至16級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 頑強
entries: 從17級開始，當你骰先攻時且已經沒有剩下的卓越骰時，你獲得一顆卓越骰。

classFeatures.name: 額外戰技
entries: 在17級時，你學會一個你所選擇的額外戰技，從戰士的戰鬥大師範型的可選戰技列表中選擇。

classFeatures.name: 野性感官
entries: 在18級時，你獲得超自然的感官以幫助你對抗看不見的生物。當你攻擊一個你看不見的生物時，你並不會因為無法看見它而在你對它進行的攻擊檢定中承受劣勢。同時，只要該生物沒有躲藏於你，且你不處於{@condition 目盲}或{@condition 耳聾}狀態，則你也能察覺到任何距離你30呎內{@condition 隱形}生物的位置。

classFeatures.name: 屬性值提升
entries: 當你在此職業升至19級時，你可以增加一項自選屬性值2點，或著你可以增加二項自選屬性值各1點。如同平常一樣，你不能透過這個能力將一個屬性值提升至超過20。
如果你的DM允許使用專長的話，你也可以改為獲得一個{@5etools 專長|feats.html}。

classFeatures.name: 眾敵屠戮
entries: 在20級時，你成為了一名針對你敵人的無雙獵手。在你的每個回合一次，你可以將你的睿知調整值加到你對你其中一個宿敵所進行的攻擊檢定或傷害骰中。你可以選擇在擲骰之前或之後使用此能力，但是必須在任何擲骰效果適用之前使用。

subclassFeatures.name: 獵人
entries: 仿效獵人範型意味著接受你做為文明和荒野恐懼間壁壘的身分。隨著你行走在獵人的道途上，你學會對抗迎面而來威脅的專業技巧，從狂暴的食人魔、成群的獸人、到巨人和恐怖的龍族們。

entries.name: 狩者獵物
entries: 在3級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：巨怪獵者、巨人殺手、或滅族者。

entries.name: 巨怪獵者
entries: 你的執著可以毀滅最強大的敵人。當你以一次武器攻擊命中一個生物，若它的生命值低於最大值，則該生物將受到額外的{@dice 1d8}傷害。你每回合只能造成一次這個額外傷害。

entries.name: 巨人殺手
entries: 當一個距離你5呎內，體型為大型或更大的生物對你進行的一次攻擊命中或失手時，只要你可以看見該生物，你就可以使用你的反應以立刻在它的攻擊之後對它進行攻擊。

entries.name: 滅族者
entries: 在你的每個回合一次，當你進行一次武器攻擊時，你可以使用相同的武器對一個距離原本目標5呎內，且處於你武器射程內的另一個生物進行另一次攻擊。

entries.name: 防禦性戰術
entries: 在7級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：逃離眾敵、防禦多重攻擊、或鋼鐵意志。

entries.name: 逃離眾敵
entries: 所有對你進行的藉機攻擊將具有劣勢。

entries.name: 防禦多重攻擊
entries: 當一個生物以一次攻擊命中你時，你的AC將對該生物在該回合中所進行的所有後續攻擊獲得+4的加值。

entries.name: 鋼鐵意志
entries: 你在對抗{@condition 恐懼}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

entries.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 在11級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：箭雨、或劍刃風暴。

entries.name: 箭雨
entries: 你可以使用你的動作以進行一次遠程攻擊，並以處於你武器射程內你所能看見一點的周圍10呎範圍內的任意數量個生物做為目標。你必須有足夠的彈藥以攻擊每個目標，且你為每個目標進行各自的攻擊檢定。

entries.name: 劍刃風暴
entries: 你可以使用你的動作以進行一次近戰攻擊，並以距離你5呎內的任意數量個生物做為目標，為每個目標進行各自的攻擊檢定。

entries.name: 卓越獵人防禦
entries: 在15級時，你獲得下列其中一個你所選擇的能力：反射閃避、逆潮而立、或直覺閃避。

entries.name: 反射閃避
entries: 你可以靈活地躲開某些範圍效果，像是紅龍的火焰吐息、或{@spell 閃電束}法術。當你成為一個允許你進行敏捷豁免以僅承受一半傷害的效果的目標時，你改為在豁免成功時不受任何傷害，且在豁免失敗時僅承受一半傷害。

entries.name: 逆潮而立
entries: 當一個敵對生物對你進行的一次近戰攻擊失手，你可以使用你的反應以強迫該生物對你所選擇的另一個生物（除了它自己以外）重複進行一次該攻擊。

entries.name: 直覺閃避
entries: 當一個你所能看見的攻擊者使用一次攻擊命中你，你可以使用你的反應以減半該次攻擊對你的傷害。

subclassFeatures.name: 獸王
entries: 獸王範型體現了文明種族和自然野獸之間的情誼。團結一致，野獸和游俠將共同對抗威脅著文明和自然世界的可怕敵人。仿效獸王範型意味著將自己奉獻給這個理念，與動物做為同伴和朋友一同奮鬥。

entries.name: 遊俠動物夥伴
entries: 在3級時，你獲得一個動物夥伴，牠將陪伴你一起冒險，並受過訓練以與你一起戰鬥。選擇一個{@filter 體型不超過中型，且挑戰等級為1/4或更低的野獸|bestiary|challenge rating=0;1/8;1/4|type=beast|size=f;d;t;s;m|miscellaneous=!swarm}。將你的熟練加值加入該野獸的AC、攻擊檢定、傷害骰，以及任何牠所熟練的豁免檢定和技能中。牠的生命值最大值等同於牠正常的生命值最大值或你遊俠等級的四倍，兩者取高。

該野獸將盡其所能的服從你的命令。牠會在你的先攻順序採取牠的行動，儘管除非你命令牠，否則牠不會採取任何動作。在你的回合，你可以口頭命令該野獸移動到某處（你不需要花費動作）。你也可以使用你的動作以口頭命令牠採取{@action 攻擊}、{@action 疾走}、{@action 撤離}、{@action 閃避}、或{@action 協助}動作。一旦你獲得額外攻擊能力，則當你命令該野獸採取{@action 攻擊}動作時，你可以自己進行一次武器攻擊。
若你處於{@condition 無力}狀態或不在現場，你的動物夥伴將會自主行動，專注於保護你或牠自己。牠使用牠的反應時不需要你的命令，例如進行一次藉機攻擊。
跟其他生物一樣，野獸可以在短休期間消耗生命骰。
當你只和該野獸一起在你的偏好環境中旅行時，你們能夠以正常步調隱匿移動。
若該野獸死亡，你可以藉由花費8小時的時間以用魔法與另一個對你不具有敵意的野獸建立連結以再次獲得動物夥伴。該野獸可以是與之前那隻相同或不同類型的野獸。

entries.name: 超絕訓練
entries: 從7級開始，在你的任何回合，只要你的動物夥伴沒有攻擊，你就可以使用一個附贈動作以命令該野獸在它的回合採取{@action 疾走}、{@action 撤離}、或{@action 協助}動作。此外，該野獸的攻擊現在起將在克服對非魔法攻擊和傷害的抗性和免疫能力時被視作魔法攻擊。

entries.name: 野性狂怒
entries: 從11級開始，當你命令你的動物夥伴採取{@action 攻擊}動作時，該野獸可以進行二次攻擊。

entries.name: 法術共享
entries: 從15級開始，當你施放以你自己為目標的法術時，若你的動物夥伴距離你30呎內，你也可以讓它受到該法術的影響。

subclassFeatures.name: Deep Stalker
entries: Many Deep Stalkers are elves, as those folk know all too well the threat posed by the drow. Deep Stalkers scout for new passages into the Underdark, carefully mapping them and working to ensure they remain watched at all times. They venture into the depths on long, dangerous patrols, disappearing for months at a time. Many of them never return. Deep Stalkers master spells useful in navigating the Underdark, and their combat tactics focus on ambush, surprise, and stealth. They fight alone or in small groups in hostile territory, relying on clever tactics to carry the day.

entries.name: Deep Stalker Magic
entries: From 3rd level, you have darkvision with a range of 90 feet. You also gain access to additional spells at 3rd, 5th, 9th, 13th, and 15th level. You are always able to cast these spells, and they do not count against your number of ranger spells known.

entries.name: Underdark Scout
entries: At 3rd level, you master the art of the ambush. On your first turn during combat, you gain a +10 bonus to your speed. If you use the attack action on that turn, you can make one additional attack. You gain an additional benefit on all turns after your first turn. At the end of each such turn, you can attempt to hide as a bonus action if you meet the normal requirements for hiding.

entries.name: Iron Mind
entries: At 7th level, you gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws.

entries.name: Stalker's Flurry
entries: Starting at 11th level, you have the ability to ensure that your attacks count. If you miss with an attack during your turn, you can immediately make an additional attack. You can gain one additional attack during your turn with this ability.

entries.name: Stalker's Dodge
entries: At 15th level, you master the ability to disrupt an opponent's attacks. If a creature attacks you and does not have advantage on the attack roll, you can use your reaction to grant it disadvantage on the attack roll. You must use this ability before you know the result of the attack.

subclassFeatures.name: Horizon Walker
entries: Rangers of the Horizon Conclave guard the world against threats that originate from other planes. They seek out planar portals and keep watch over them, venturing to the outer and inner planes as needed to defeat threats.

entries.name: Planar Magic
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Horizon Walker Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, and it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.name: Planar Warrior
entries: At 3rd level, you learn to draw on the energy of the planes to augment your attacks.

As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. Until the end of this turn, your attacks against that creature ignore its damage resistances, and the next time you hit it on this turn, it takes an additional {@dice 1d6} force damage.

entries.name: Portal Lore
entries: At 3rd level, you gain the ability to detect the presence of planar portals. As an action, you detect the distance and direction to any planar portals within 1,000 feet of you. You also sense which plane of existence each portal leads to. However, if magic obscures any details of a portal, this feature doesn't reveal them.
Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest. Alternatively, you can use the feature again if you expend a spell slot of 2nd level or higher.
See the "Planar Travel" section in chapter 2 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for examples of planar portals.

entries.name: Ethereal Step
entries: At 7th level, you learn to step through the Ethereal Plane. As a bonus action on your turn, you can cast the {@spell etherealness} spell with this feature, but the spell ends at the end of the current turn. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Distant Strike
entries: At 11th level, you gain the ability to step between the planes in a blink of an eye. When you use the {@action Attack} action, you can teleport up to 10 feet before each attack. You must be able to see the destination of the teleportation.
If you attack at least two different creatures with the action, you can make one additional attack with it against a third creature.

entries.name: Spectral Defense
entries: At 15th level, your ability to move between planes becomes even more finely tuned. As a reaction when you take damage, you can halve that damage against you. For a moment, you slip into the planar boundary to lessen the harm.

subclassFeatures.name: Primeval Guardian
entries: Rangers of the Primeval Guardian Conclave follow an ancient tradition rooted in powerful druidic magic. These rangers learn to become one with nature, allowing them to channel the aspects of various beasts and plants in order to overcome their foes.

These rangers dwell in the elder forests of the world. They venture out only rarely, as they consider it their sacred duty to protect the druidic groves and ancient trees that saw the earliest days of the world.

entries.name: Guardian Magic
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Primeval Guardian Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you, and it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.name: Guardian Soul
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you gain the ability to temporarily grow and take on the appearance of a treelike person, covered with leaves and bark. As a bonus action, you assume this guardian form, which lasts until you end it as a bonus action or until you are {@condition incapacitated}.
You undergo the following changes while in your guardian form:

items: Your size becomes Large, unless you were larger.
Any speed you have becomes 5 feet, unless the speed was lower.
Your reach increases by 5 feet.
You gain a number of temporary hit points at the start of each of your turns. The number equals half your ranger level. When the form ends, you lose any temporary hit points you have from it.

entries.name: Piercing Thorns
entries: At 3rd level, your command of primal magic allows you to enhance your attacks with thorns. Once during each of your turns, you can deal an additional {@dice 1d6} piercing damage to one creature you hit with a weapon attack.

entries.name: Ancient Fortitude
entries: At 7th level, you gain the endurance of the ancient forests. Your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 2 per ranger level when you assume your guardian form. This increase lasts until you leave the form; your hit point maximum then returns to normal, but your current hit points remain the same, unless they must decrease to abide by your hit point maximum.
Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Rooted Defense
entries: At 11th level, you gain the ability to twist and turn the ground beneath you. While you are in your guardian form, the ground within 30 feet of you is difficult terrain for your enemies.

entries.name: Guardian Aura
entries: Starting at 15th level, your guardian form emanates a magical aura that fortifies your injured allies. When any ally starts their turn within 30 feet of your guardian form, that ally regains a number of hit points equal to half your ranger level. This aura has no effect on a creature that has half or more of its hit points, and it has no effect on undead and constructs.

subclassFeatures.name: Monster Slayer
entries: Rangers of the Slayer Conclave seek out vampires, dragons, evil fey, fiends, and other powerful magical threats. Trained in a variety of arcane and divine techniques to overcome such monsters, slayers are experts at unearthing and defeating mighty foes.

entries.name: Slayer's Mysticism
entries: You learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Slayer Spells table. The spell counts as a ranger spell for you but doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

entries.name: Slayer's Eye
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you gain the ability to study and unravel a creature's defenses. As a bonus action, choose one creature you can see within 120 feet of you. You immediately learn the target's vulnerabilities, immunities, and resistances. You also learn any special effects triggered when the target takes damage, such as fire damage halting its regeneration.
In addition, the first time each turn you hit the target with a weapon attack, the target takes an extra {@dice 1d6} damage from the weapon.
This benefit lasts until you target a different creature with this feature or until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Supernatural Defense
entries: At 7th level, you gain extra resilience against your prey's assaults on your mind and body. Whenever the target of your Slayer's Eye forces you to make a saving throw, add {@dice 1d6} to your roll.

entries.name: Relentless Slayer
entries: At 11th level, you gain the ability to foil your foe's ability to escape. Your study of folklore and arcane knowledge gives you a key insight to keep your prey cornered. If the target of your Slayer's Eye attempts to teleport, change its shape, travel to another plane of existence, or turn gaseous, you can use your reaction to make a Wisdom check contested by a Wisdom check made by the target. To use this ability, you must be able to see the target and need to be within 30 feet of it. If you succeed, you foil its attempt, causing it to waste the action, bonus action, or reaction it used.

entries.name: Slayer's Counter
entries: At 15th level, you gain the ability to counterattack when your prey tries to sabotage you. If the target of your Slayer's Eye forces you to make a saving throw, you can use your reaction to make one weapon attack against it. You make this attack immediately before making the saving throw. If the attack hits, your save automatically succeeds, in addition to the attack's normal effects.

subclassFeatures.name: 幽域追蹤者
entries: 幽域追蹤者居身於那些最黑暗的場所：地表深處、暗巷之間、太古叢林、和其他任何籠罩在昏暗微光的地方。大部分人們在進入這種場所時都會驚恐不安，但幽域追蹤者們卻能大膽於黑暗中冒險，試圖在威脅來到廣闊世界之前伏擊它們。這類遊俠經常出沒於幽暗地域，但是他們也會前往任何邪惡勢力蟄伏的所在。

entries.name: 幽域追蹤者魔法
entries: 從3級開始，當你在本職業升至特定等級，你將學會額外的法術，如幽域追蹤者法術表所示。這些法術對你而言視作遊俠法術，但並不會計入你已知遊俠法術的數量中。

entries.name: 懼怖伏兵
entries: 在3級時，你精通於伏擊的藝術。你可以讓你先攻檢定獲得等同於你睿知調整值的加值。
在每個戰鬥的你的第一個回合開始時，你的步行速度增加10呎，持續直到該回合結束。若你在該回合採取{@action 攻擊}動作，做為該動作的一部份，你可以進行一次額外的武器攻擊。若該攻擊命中，則目標將受到額外{@dice 1d8}該武器傷害類型的傷害。

entries.name: 幽影視覺
entries: 在3級時，你獲得60呎範圍的黑暗視覺。若你已經擁有來自你種族的黑暗視覺，則它的範圍將增加30呎。
你也擅長於避開依賴於黑暗視覺的生物。當處於黑暗環境時，你對任何嘗試依靠黑暗視覺以看見黑暗中的你的生物而言處於{@condition 隱形}狀態。

entries.name: 鋼鐵心智
entries: 從7級起，你已磨練出用於抵抗來自於你獵物的精神影響力量的能力。你獲得睿知豁免的熟練。若你已經擁有此熟練，則你可以改為獲得智力豁免或魅力豁免的熟練（由你選擇）。

entries.name: 追獵如風
entries: 在11級時，你學會以出人意料的高速進行攻擊，以讓你將一次失手轉變成另一次打擊。在你的每個回合一次，當你的一次武器攻擊失手時，你可以進行另一次武器攻擊以做為同個動作的一部份。

entries.name: 暗影閃避
entries: 從15級開始，隨著一縷環繞在你身邊的超自然陰影，你能夠以令人無法預料的方式閃躲。當一個生物對你進行一次攻擊檢定且該檢定不具有優勢，你可以使用你的反應以讓它承受劣勢。你必須在你知道該攻擊檢定的結果之前決定是否使用此能力。

subclassFeatures.name: 境界行者
entries: 境界行者守護著世界不受來自其他位面、或試圖以異界魔法摧毀凡界的威脅所侵害。他們尋找並看守著位面傳送門，為了追捕他們的敵人而冒險穿梭於內層位面和外層位面。這些遊俠也是多元宇宙中任何致力於守護位面中生靈和秩序的勢力的盟友—尤其是那些善良龍族、精類、和元素生物。

entries.name: 境界行者魔法
entries: 從3級開始，當你在本職業升至特定等級，你將學會額外的法術，如境界行者法術表所示。這些法術對你而言視作遊俠法術，但並不會計入你已知遊俠法術的數量中。

entries.name: 偵測傳送門
entries: 在3級時，你獲得以魔法感知位面傳送門存在的能力。以一個動作，你偵測出距離你1哩內最近的位面傳送門的距離以及方位。
一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前你都不能再使用它。
參見《地下城主指南》第二章的「位面旅行」章節以查看關於位面傳送門的例子。

entries.name: 位面戰士
entries: 在3級時，你學會汲取多元宇宙中的能量以增強你的攻擊。
以一個附贈動作，選擇一個距離你30呎內且你所能看見的生物。下一次你在該回合以一次武器攻擊命中該生物時，該攻擊所造成的所有傷害都將變成力場傷害，且該生物將受到來自該攻擊的額外{@dice 1d8}力場傷害。當你在本職業升至11級時，這個額外傷害將增加至{@dice 2d8}。

entries.name: 靈界漫步
entries: 在7級時，你學會跨入乙太位面。以一個附贈動作，你能夠以此能力施放{@spell 跨入乙太界}法術，無須消耗法術位。但此法術將在當回合結束時結束。
一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 閃現打擊
entries: 在11級時，你獲得在眨眼間穿梭於位面間的能力。當你採取{@action 攻擊}動作時，你可以在每次攻擊之前傳送最多10呎距離到一處你所能看見的未被佔據空間。
若你以該動作攻擊了至少二個不同的生物，你可以再額外對第三個生物進行一次攻擊。

entries.name: 虛體防禦
entries: 在15級時，你穿梭在位面之間的能力讓你得以溜進位面邊界以減輕你在戰鬥中所受到的傷害。當你受到來自於一次攻擊的傷害時，你可以使用你的反應以讓你自己獲得所有對這回合該攻擊傷害的抗性。

subclassFeatures.name: 怪物殺手
entries: 你致力於獵殺那些黑夜中的怪物和邪惡魔法的施行者。一名怪物殺手尋覓著吸血鬼、龍、邪惡精類、邪魔、以及其他魔法威脅。受過用以戰勝這類怪物的超自然技術訓練，怪物殺手精通於找出並擊敗那些強大且神秘的敵人。

entries.name: 怪物殺手魔法
entries: 從3級開始，當你在本職業升至特定等級，你將學會額外的法術，如怪物殺手法術表所示。這些法術對你而言視作遊俠法術，但並不會計入你已知遊俠法術的數量中。

entries.name: 獵人感知
entries: 在3級時，你獲得凝視一個生物並以魔法知悉傷害它最佳的方式的能力。以一個動作，選擇一個距離你60呎內且你所能看見的生物。你將立刻知道該生物是否擁有任何傷害免疫、抗性、或是易傷，以及它們的種類。若該生物不受預言系魔法影響，則你感知到的結果將會是它不具有任何傷害免疫、抗性、和易傷。
你可以使用此能力的次數等同於你的睿知調整值（最少一次）。你在完成一次長休後恢復所有你花費掉的次數。

entries.name: 殺手獵物
entries: 從3級開始，你可以專注你的憤怒於單一敵人，增加你對它所造成的傷害。以一個附贈動作，你指定一個距離你60呎內且你所能看見的生物做為此能力的目標。每個回合當你第一次以武器攻擊命中目標時，它將額外受到來自該武器的{@dice 1d6}傷害。
這個好處將持續直到你完成一次短休或長休，或在你指定另一個不同生物做為目標時提早結束。

entries.name: 超常防禦
entries: 在7級時，你獲得額外的韌性以抵抗你獵物對你身體和精神所做出的侵襲。每當你殺手獵物所指定的目標強迫你進行一次豁免檢定，或每當你進行一次屬性檢定以嘗試脫離該目標的擒抱，骰{@dice 1d6}並將其加入你的擲骰結果中。

entries.name: 魔法剋星
entries: 在11級時，你獲得阻撓其他人魔法的能力。當你看見一個距離你60呎內的生物施放法術或傳送，你可以使用你的反應以嘗試以魔法挫敗它。該生物必須成功通過一次對抗你法術豁免DC的睿知豁免，否則它的法術或傳送將失敗並被浪費。
一旦你使用此能力，直到你完成一次短休或長休之前你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 殺手反制
entries: 在15級時，你獲得在你的獵物嘗試妨害你時展開反擊的能力。若你殺手獵物所指定的目標強迫你進行一次豁免檢定，你可以使用你的反應以對該獵物進行一次武器攻擊。你在進行該豁免檢定之前立刻進行此攻擊。若你的攻擊命中，則除了該攻擊原本的效果之外，你的豁免檢定也將自動成功。

Rough and wild looking, a human stalks alone through the shadows of trees, hunting the orcs he knows are planning a raid on a nearby farm. Clutching a shortsword in each hand, he becomes a whirlwind of steel, cutting down one enemy after another.

After tumbling away from a cone of freezing air, an elf finds her feet and draws back her bow to loose an arrow at the white dragon. Shrugging off the wave of fear that emanates from the dragon like the cold of its breath, she sends one arrow after another to find the gaps between the dragon's thick scales.

Holding his hand high, a half-elf whistles to the hawk that circles high above him, calling the bird back to his side. Whispering instructions in Elvish, he points to the owlbear he's been tracking and sends the hawk to distract the creature while he readies his bow.

Far from the bustle of cities and towns, past the hedges that shelter the most distant farms from the terrors of the wild, amid the dense-packed trees of trackless forests and across wide and empty plains, rangers keep their unending watch.

entries.name: Deadly Hunters
entries: Warriors of the wilderness, rangers specialize in hunting the monsters that threaten the edges of civilization—humanoid raiders, rampaging beasts and monstrosities, terrible giants, and deadly dragons. They learn to track their quarry as a predator does, moving stealthily through the wilds and hiding themselves in brush and rubble. Rangers focus their combat training on techniques that are particularly useful against their specific favored foes.

Thanks to their familiarity with the wilds, rangers acquire the ability to cast spells that harness nature's power, much as a druid does. Their spells, like their combat abilities, emphasize speed, stealth, and the hunt. A ranger's talents and abilities are honed with deadly focus on the grim task of protecting the borderlands.

entries.name: Independent Adventurers
entries: Though a ranger might make a living as a hunter, a guide, or a tracker, a ranger's true calling is to defend the outskirts of civilization from the ravages of monsters and humanoid hordes that press in from the wild. In some places, rangers gather in secretive orders or join forces with druidic circles. Many rangers, though, are independent almost to a fault, knowing that, when a dragon or a band of orcs attacks, a ranger might be the first—and possibly the last—line of defense.

This fierce independence makes rangers well suited to adventuring, since they are accustomed to life far from the comforts of a dry bed and a hot bath. Faced with city-bred adventurers who grouse and whine about the hardships of the wild, rangers respond with some mixture of amusement, frustration, and compassion. But they quickly learn that other adventurers who can carry their own weight in a fight against civilization's foes are worth any extra burden. Coddled city folk might not know how to feed themselves or find fresh water in the wild, but they make up for it in other ways.

entries.name: Creating a Ranger
entries: As you create your ranger character, consider the nature of the training that gave you your particular capabilities. Did you train with a single mentor, wandering the wilds together until you mastered the ranger's ways? Did you leave your apprenticeship, or was your mentor slain—perhaps by the same kind of monster that became your favored enemy? Or perhaps you learned your skills as part of a band of rangers affiliated with a druidic circle, trained in mystic paths as well as wilderness lore. You might be self-taught, a recluse who learned combat skills, tracking, and even a magical connection to nature through the necessity of surviving in the wilds.

What's the source of your particular hatred of a certain kind of enemy? Did a monster kill someone you loved or destroy your home village? Or did you see too much of the destruction these monsters cause and commit yourself to reining in their depredations? Is your adventuring career a continuation of your work in protecting the borderlands, or a significant change? What made you join up with a band of adventurers? Do you find it challenging to teach new allies the ways of the wild, or do you welcome the relief from solitude that they offer?

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a ranger quickly by following these suggestions. First, make Dexterity your highest ability score, followed by Wisdom. (Some rangers who focus on two-weapon fighting make Strength higher than Dexterity.) Second, choose the {@background outlander} background.

I spend a lot of my life away from civilization, keeping to its fringes to protect it. Don't assume that because I don't bend the knee to your king that I haven't done more to protect him than all his knights put together.

Rangers are free-minded wanderers and seekers who patrol the edges of civilized territory, turning back the denizens of the wild lands beyond. It is a thankless job, since their efforts are rarely understood and almost never rewarded. Yet rangers persist in their duties, never doubting that their work makes the world a safer place.

A relationship with civilization informs every ranger's personality and history. Some rangers see themselves as enforcers of the law and bringers of justice on civilization's frontier, answering to no sovereign power. Others are survivalists who eschew civilization altogether. They vanquish monsters to keep themselves safe while they live in and travel through the perilous wild areas of the world. If their efforts also benefit the kingdoms and other civilized realms that they avoid, so be it.
If you're creating or playing a ranger character, the following sections offer ideas for embellishing the character and enhancing your roleplaying experience.

entries.name: View of the World
entries: A ranger's view of the world begins (and sometimes ends) with that character's outlook toward civilized folk and the places they occupy. Some rangers have an attitude toward civilization that's deeply rooted in disdain, while others pity the people they have sworn to protect—though on the battlefield, it's impossible to tell the difference between one ranger and another. Indeed, to those who have seen them operate and been the beneficiaries of their prowess, it scarcely matters why rangers do what they do. That said, no two rangers are likely to express their opinions on any matter in the same way.

If you haven't yet thought about the details of your character's worldview, consider putting a finer point on things by summarizing that viewpoint in a short statement (such as the entries on the following table). How might that feeling affect the way you conduct yourself?

entries.caption: View of the World
rows: Towns and cities are the best places for those who can't survive on their own.
The advancement of civilization is the best way to thwart chaos, but its reach must be monitored.
Towns and cities are a necessary evil, but once the wilderness is purged of supernatural threats, we will need them no more.
Walls are for cowards, who huddle behind them while others do the work of making the world safe.
Visiting a town is not unpleasant, but after a few days I feel the irresistible call to return to the wild.
Cities breed weakness by isolating folk from the harsh lessons of the wild.

entries.name: Homelands
entries: All rangers, regardless of how they came to take up the profession, have a strong connection to the natural world and its various terrains. For some rangers, the wilderness is where they grew up, either as a result of being born there or moving there at a young age. For other rangers, civilization was originally home, but the wilderness became a second homeland.

Think of your character's backstory and decide what terrain feels most like home, whether or not you were born there. What does that terrain say about your personality? Does it influence which spells you choose to learn? Have your experiences there shaped who your favored enemies are?

entries.caption: Homelands
rows: You patrolled an ancient forest, darkened and corrupted by several crossings to the Shadowfell.
As part of a group of nomads, you acquired the skills for surviving in the desert.
Your early life in the Underdark prepared you for the challenges of combating its denizens.
You dwelled on the edge of a swamp, in an area imperiled by land creatures as well as aquatic ones.
Because you grew up among the peaks, finding the best path through the mountains is second nature to you.
You wandered the far north, learning how to protect yourself and prosper in a realm overrun by ice.

entries.name: Sworn Enemy
entries: Every ranger begins with a favored enemy (or two). The determination of a favored enemy might be tied to a specific event in the character's early life, or it might be entirely a matter of choice.
What spurred your character to select a particular enemy? Was the choice made because of tradition or curiosity, or do you have a grudge to settle?

entries.caption: Sworn Enemies
rows: You seek revenge on nature's behalf for the great transgressions your foe has committed.
Your forebears or predecessors fought these creatures, and so shall you.
You bear no enmity toward your foe. You stalk such creatures as a hunter tracks down a wild animal.
You find your foe fascinating, and you collect books of tales and history concerning it.
You collect tokens of your fallen enemies to remind you of each kill.
You respect your chosen enemy, and you see your battles as a test of respective skills.
